
-----title

class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_826338'></div><div id='poem_sentence_1_826338_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=715&endYear=716')">715-716年</a>　十五岁前后，有赋。作品：《明堂赋（并序）》<span class='inlineComment2'>（郁贤皓疑此赋作于开元二十三年游东都洛阳时，见《李太白全集校注》第3406页。）</span>《拟恨赋》<div id='poem_1366891' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366891' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366891?labeling=true' target='_blank'>明堂赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（715年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366891")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366891_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1366891'>昔在天皇。告成岱宗。改元乾封。经始明堂。年纪总章。时缔构之未辑。痛威灵之遐迈。天后继作。中宗成之。因兆人之子来。崇万祀之丕业。盖天皇先天。中宗奉天。累圣纂就。鸿勋克宣。臣白美颂。恭惟述焉。其辞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1366891_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366891'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366891'>伊皇唐之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1366891", 1366891, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>革天</span>创元也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366891_comment'></div>我高祖乃仗大顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366891_comment'></div>赫然电发以首之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366891_comment'></div>于是横八荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366891_comment'></div>漂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1366891", 1366891, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>九阳</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366891_comment'></div>扫叛涣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366891_comment'></div>开混茫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366891_comment'></div>景星耀而太阶平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366891_comment'></div>虹蜺灭而日月张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366891_comment'></div>钦若太宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366891_comment'></div>继明重光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366891_comment'></div>廓区宇以立极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366891_comment'></div>缀苍昊之颓纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366891_comment'></div>淳风<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1366891", 1366891, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>沕穆</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366891_comment'></div>鸿恩滂洋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366891_comment'></div>武义烜赫于有截。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366891_comment'></div>仁声馺沓乎无疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366891_comment'></div>若乃高宗绍兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366891_comment'></div>拓统锡羡。<div id='poem_sentence_20_1366891_comment'></div>元符剖兮地珍见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366891_comment'></div>既应天而顺人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366891_comment'></div>遂登封而降禅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1366891_comment'></div>将欲考有洛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1366891_comment'></div>崇明堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1366891_comment'></div>惟厥功之未辑兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1366891_comment'></div>乘白云于帝乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1366891_comment'></div>天后勤劳辅政兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1366891_comment'></div>中宗以钦明克昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1366891_comment'></div>遵先轨以继作兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1366891_comment'></div>则使轩辕草图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1366891_comment'></div>羲和练日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1366891_comment'></div>经之营之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1366891_comment'></div>粲宇宙之光辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1366891_comment'></div>崔嵬赫奕。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1366891_comment'></div>洞清阴乎群山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1366891_comment'></div>及乎烟云卷舒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1366891_comment'></div>忽出乍没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1366891_comment'></div>岌嵩喷伊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1366891_comment'></div>倚日薄月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1366891_comment'></div>雷霆之所鼓荡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1366891_comment'></div>星斗之所伾仡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1366891_comment'></div>拿金龙之蟠蜿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1366891_comment'></div>挂天珠之硉矹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1366891_comment'></div>势拔五岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1366891_comment'></div>形张四维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1366891_comment'></div>轧地轴以<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_7_25825_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_25825'>洗砚修良策，敲松拟素贞。<div id='poem_sentence_8_25825_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_25825_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=721&endYear=723')">721-723年</a>　读书匡山。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=724&endYear=724')">724年</a>　下匡山，有诗。作品：《别匡山》<span class='inlineComment2'>（郁贤皓主张此诗当是开元十年李白拟出蜀而告别匡山读书处之作，见《李太白全集校注》第4140页。）</span><div id='poem_25720' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_25720' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/25720?labeling=true' target='_blank'>别匡山</a><span class='authorDate'>（724年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_25720")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_25720_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_25720'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_25720'>晓峰如画碧参差，藤影风摇拂槛垂。<div id='poem_sentence_0_25720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_25720'>野径来多将犬伴，人间归晚带樵随。<div id='poem_sentence_1_25720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_25720'>看云客倚啼猿树，洗钵僧临失鹤池。<div id='poem_sentence_2_25720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_25720'>莫怪无心恋清境，已将书剑许明时。<div id='poem_sentence_3_25720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_25720'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_25720_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_25720'><span class='label'>按：</span>（见光绪《重修江油县志》卷二十四）（陈广福《李白的〈别匡山〉诗考》谓江油县匡山书院存宋熙宁元年《敕赐中和大明寺住持碑》，碑文云：「玄宗朝翰林学士李白字太白，少为当县小吏，后于此山读书，于乔松滴翠之平有十载。」文中录此诗。）<br /></div><div id='poem_note_25720_comment'></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
平武（江油）

<div class='label1' id='6eb90d49ed5b4ed59160576141c8addf_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("6eb90d49ed5b4ed59160576141c8addf");'><span id='6eb90d49ed5b4ed59160576141c8addf_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=718&endYear=718')">718年</a>，18岁</div><div id='6eb90d49ed5b4ed59160576141c8addf' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=718&endYear=718')">718年</a>　往来旁郡，游江油，有诗赠友人。作品：《赠江油尉》<span class='inlineComment2'>（郁贤皓疑此诗作于开元六年，见《李太白全集校注》第4159页。）</span><div id='poem_515152' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_515152' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/515152?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠江油尉厅</a><span class='authorDate'>（718年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_515152")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_515152_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_515152'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_515152'>岚光深院里，傍砌水泠泠。<div id='poem_sentence_0_515152_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_515152'>野燕巢官舍，溪云入古厅。<div id='poem_sentence_1_515152_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_515152'>日斜孤吏过，帘捲乱峰青。<div id='poem_sentence_2_515152_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_515152'>五色神仙尉，焚香读道经<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_515152_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_515152'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_515152_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_515152'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_515152_0'>⑴ 清陆增祥《八琼室金石补正》卷一一○，米芾书《太白江油尉厅诗》</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_515152_comment'></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
成都
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='8292c032153e4ef2ab9efa1490850635_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8292c032153e4ef2ab9efa1490850635");'><span id='8292c032153e4ef2ab9efa1490850635_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=720&endYear=720')">720年</a>，20岁</div><div id='8292c032153e4ef2ab9efa1490850635' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>春，游成都，有诗。作品：《登锦城散花楼》<span class='inlineComment2'>（郁贤皓主张此诗作于开元九年，见《李太白全集校注》第2555页。）</span><div id='poem_26404' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_26404' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/26404?labeling=true' target='_blank'>登锦城散花楼</a><span class='authorDate'>（720年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_26404")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_26404_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_26404'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_26404'>日照锦城头，朝光<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_26404", 26404, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>散花</span>楼。<div id='poem_sentence_0_26404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_26404'>金窗夹绣户，珠箔悬银<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作琼）</span>钩。<div id='poem_sentence_1_26404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_26404'>飞梯绿云中，极目散我忧<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作愁）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_26404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_26404'>暮雨向三峡，春江绕双流。<div id='poem_sentence_3_26404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_26404'>今来一登望，如上九天游。<div id='poem_sentence_4_26404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_26404'></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_26404_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>谒苏颋。有赋。颋甚赞其才，复励之以学。作品：《大猎赋（并序）》<div id='poem_1366892' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366892' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366892?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大猎赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（720年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366892")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366892_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1366892'>白以为赋者古诗之流。辞欲壮丽。义归博达。不然。何以光赞盛美。感天动神。而相如子云。竞誇词赋。历代以为文雄。莫敢诋吁。臣请语其大略。窃或褊其用心。子虚所言。楚国不过千里。梦泽居其大半。而齐徒吞若八九。三农及禽兽无息肩之地。非诸侯禁淫述职之义也。上林云。左苍梧。右西极。考其实地。周袤才经数百。长扬夸胡。设网为周阹。放麋鹿其中。以搏攫充乐。羽猎于灵台之囿。围经百里而开殿门。当时以为穷壮极丽。迨今观之。何龌龊之甚也。但王者以四海为家。万姓为子。则天下之山林禽兽。岂与众庶异之。而臣以为不能以大道匡君。示物周博。平文论苑囿之小。窃为微臣之不取也。今圣朝园池遐荒。殚穷六合。以孟冬十月。大猎于秦。亦将耀威讲武。扫天荡野。岂淫荒侈靡。非三驱之意邪。臣白作颂。折衷厥美。其辞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1366892_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366892'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366892'>粤若皇唐之挈天地而袭气母兮。粲五叶之葳蕤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366892_comment'></div>惟开元廓海宇而运斗极兮。总六圣之光熙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366892_comment'></div>诞金德之纯精兮。漱玉露之华滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366892_comment'></div>文章森乎七曜兮。制作参乎两仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366892_comment'></div>括<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>众妙</span>而为师。明无幽而不烛兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366892_comment'></div>泽无远而不施。慕往昔之三驱兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366892_comment'></div>顺生杀于四时。若乃严冬惨切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366892_comment'></div>寒气<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>凛冽</span>。不周来风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366892_comment'></div>元冥掌雪。木脱叶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366892_comment'></div>草解节。土囊烟阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366892_comment'></div>火井冰闭。是月也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366892_comment'></div>天子处乎元堂之中。餐八水兮休百工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366892_comment'></div>考王制兮遵国风。乐农人之閒隙兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366892_comment'></div>因校猎而讲戎。乃使神兵出于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>九阙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366892_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>天仗</span>罗于四野。徵水衡与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>林虞</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366892_comment'></div>辨土物之众寡。千骑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>飙扫</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366892_comment'></div>万乘雷奔。梢扶桑而拂火云兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366892_comment'></div>刮月窟而搜寒门。赫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>壮观</span>于今古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366892_comment'></div>嶪摇荡于乾坤。此其大略也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366892_comment'></div>而内以中华为天心。外以穷发为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>海口</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366892_comment'></div>豁咽喉以洞开。吞荒裔以尽取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366892_comment'></div>大章按步以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>来往</span>。夸父振策而奔走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366892_comment'></div>足迹乎日月之所通。囊括乎阴阳之未有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366892_comment'></div>君王于是撞鸿钟。发銮音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1366892_comment'></div>出凤阙。开宸襟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1366892_comment'></div>驾玉辂之飞龙。历神州之层岑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1366892_comment'></div>游<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>五柞</span>兮瞰三危。挟细柳兮过上林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1366892_comment'></div>攒高牙以总总兮。驻华盖之森森。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1366892_comment'></div>于是擢倚天之剑。弯落月之弓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1366892_comment'></div>昆崙叱兮可倒。宇宙噫兮增雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1366892_comment'></div>河汉为之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>却流</span>。川岳为之生风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1366892_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>羽毛</span>扬兮九天绛。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>猎火</span>燃兮千山红。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1366892_comment'></div>乃召蚩尤之徒。聚长戟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1366892_comment'></div>罗广泽。呵雨师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1366892_comment'></div>走风伯。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>棱威</span>耀乎雷霆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1366892_comment'></div>烜赫震于蛮貊。陋梁都之体制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1366892_comment'></div>鄙灵囿之规格。而南以衡霍作襟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1366892_comment'></div>北以岱恒作袪。夹东海而为堑兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1366892_comment'></div>拖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>西冥</span>而流渠。麾九州之珍禽兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1366892_comment'></div>回千群以坌入。联八荒之奇兽兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1366892_comment'></div>屯万族而来居。云罗高张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1366892_comment'></div>天网密布。罝罘绵原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1366892_comment'></div>峭格掩路。蠛蠓过而犹碍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1366892_comment'></div>蟭螟飞而不度。彼层霄与翳榛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1366892_comment'></div>空翔鸟与伏兔。从营合技。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1366892_comment'></div>弥峦被冈。金戈森行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1366892_comment'></div>洗晴野之寒霜。虹旗电掣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1366892_comment'></div>卷长空之飞雪。吴骖走练。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1366892_comment'></div>宛马蹀血。萦众山之联绵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1366892_comment'></div>隔远水之明灭。使五丁推峰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1366892_comment'></div>一夫拔木。下堑高颓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1366892_comment'></div>深平险谷。摆椿栝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1366892_comment'></div>开林丛。喤喤<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>呷呷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1366892_comment'></div>尽奔突于场中。而田疆古冶之畴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1366892_comment'></div>乌获中黄之党。超峥嵘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1366892_comment'></div>猎苍莽。喑呜哮㘚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1366892_comment'></div>风旋电往。脱文豹之皮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1366892_comment'></div>抵元熊之掌。批狻手猱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1366892_comment'></div>挟三挈两。既徒搏以角力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1366892_comment'></div>又挥锋而争先。行甝号以鹗睨兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1366892_comment'></div>气赫火而歊烟。拳封貒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1366892_comment'></div>肘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>巨狿</span>。枭羊应叱以毙踣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1366892_comment'></div>䝟貐亡精而坠巅。或碎脑以折脊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1366892_comment'></div>或喷髓而飞涎。穷遐荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1366892_comment'></div>荡<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/128/Comments/0")'>林薮</span>。扼土伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1366892_comment'></div>殪天狗。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/131/Comments/0")'>脱角</span>犀顶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1366892_comment'></div>探牙象口。扫封狐于千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1366892_comment'></div>捩雄虺之九首。咋腾蛇而仰吞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1366892_comment'></div>拖奔兕而却走。君王于是峨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/137/Comments/0")'>通天</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1366892_comment'></div>靡星旃。奔雷车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1366892_comment'></div>挥电鞭。观壮士之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/141/Comments/0")'>效获</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1366892_comment'></div>顾三军而欣然。曰夫何神詟鬼慄之骇人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1366892_comment'></div>又命建夔鼓。励<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/145/Comments/0")'>武卒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1366892_comment'></div>虽轥轹之已多。犹拗怒而未歇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1366892_comment'></div>集赤羽兮照日。张乌号兮满月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1366892_comment'></div>戎车<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_75_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/150/Comments/0")'>轞轞</span>以陆离。彀骑煌煌而奋发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1366892_comment'></div>鹰犬之所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_76_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/152/Comments/0")'>腾捷</span>。飞走之所蹉蹶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1366892_comment'></div>攫麇麚之咆哮。蹂豺貉以挂格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1366892_comment'></div>膏锋染锷。填岩掩窟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1366892_comment'></div>观殊材与逸群。尚挥霍以出没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1366892_comment'></div>别有白𧳬飞駮。穷奇䝙獌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1366892_comment'></div>牙若错剑。鬣如丛竿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1366892_comment'></div>口吞殳鋋。目极枪橹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1366892_comment'></div>碎琅弧。攫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_83_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/167/Comments/0")'>玉弩</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1366892_comment'></div>射猛彘。透奔虎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1366892_comment'></div>金镞一发。旁叠四五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1366892_comment'></div>虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_86_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/172/Comments/0")'>凿齿磨牙</span>而致伉。谁谓南山<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_86_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/173/Comments/0")'>白额</span>之足睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1366892_comment'></div>总八校。搜四隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1366892_comment'></div>驰专诸。走都卢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1366892_comment'></div>趫乔林。撇绝壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1366892_comment'></div>抄獑猢。揽貊⿰<span class='inlineComment2'>（豸国）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1366892_comment'></div>囚鼬鼯于峻崖。顿豰貜于穹石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1366892_comment'></div>养由<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_92_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/184/Comments/0")'>发箭</span>。奇肱飞车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1366892_comment'></div>巧括更羸。妙兼蒲且。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1366892_comment'></div>坠鸀鳿于青云。落鸿雁于紫虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1366892_comment'></div>捎鸧鸹。漂鸬●90CD。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1366892_comment'></div>弹地庐。空神居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1366892_comment'></div>斩飞鹏于日域。摧大凤于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_97_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/195/Comments/0")'>天墟</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1366892_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_98_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/196/Comments/0")'>龙伯</span>钓其灵鳌。任公获其巨鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1366892_comment'></div>穷造化之谲诡。何<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_99_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/199/Comments/0")'>神怪</span>之有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1366892_comment'></div>所以喷血流川。飞毛洒雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1366892_comment'></div>乍若乎高天雨兽。上坠于大荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1366892_comment'></div>又似乎积禽为山。下崩于林穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1366892_comment'></div>阳乌沮色于旭日。阴兔丧精于明月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1366892_comment'></div>思腾装上猎于太清。所恨穹昊之路绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1366892_comment'></div>而忽也莫不海晏天空。万方来同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1366892_comment'></div>虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_106_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/212/Comments/0")'>秦皇</span>与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_106_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/212/Comments/1")'>汉武</span>兮。复何足以争雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1366892_comment'></div>俄而君王茫然改容。愀若有失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1366892_comment'></div>居安思危。防险戒逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1366892_comment'></div>斯驰骋以狂发。非至理之宏术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1366892_comment'></div>且夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_110_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/220/Comments/0")'>人君</span>以端拱为尊。元妙为宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1366892_comment'></div>暴殄天物。是谓不道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1366892_comment'></div>乃命去三面之网。示六合之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1366892_comment'></div>已杀者皆其犯命。未伤者全其天真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1366892_comment'></div>虽剪毛而不献。岂割鲜以染轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1366892_comment'></div>解凤凰与鸑鷟兮。旋驺虞与麒麟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1366892_comment'></div>获<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_116_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/232/Comments/0")'>天宝</span>于陈仓。载<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_116_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/233/Comments/0")'>非熊</span>于渭滨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1366892_comment'></div>于是享猎徒。封劳苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1366892_comment'></div>轩<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_118_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/236/Comments/0")'>行炰</span>。骑酌酤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1366892_comment'></div>韬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_119_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/238/Comments/0")'>兵戈</span>。火网罟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1366892_comment'></div>然后登九霄之台。宴八纮之圃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1366892_comment'></div>开日月之扃。辟生灵之户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1366892_comment'></div>圣人作而万物睹。览蒐岐与狩敖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1366892_comment'></div>何宣成之足数。哂穆王之荒诞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1366892_comment'></div>歌白云于西母。曷若饱人以澹泊之味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1366892_comment'></div>醉时以醇和之觞。鼓之以雷霆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1366892_comment'></div>舞之以阴阳。虞乎神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1366892_comment'></div>狃于道德。张无外以为罝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1366892_comment'></div>琢太朴以为杙。顿天网以掩之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1366892_comment'></div>猎贤俊以御极。若此之狩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1366892_comment'></div>罔有不克。使天人晏安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1366892_comment'></div>草木蕃殖。六宫斥其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_131_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/263/Comments/0")'>珠玉</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1366892_comment'></div>百姓乐于耕织。寝郑卫之声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1366892_comment'></div>却靡曼之色。天老掌图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1366892_comment'></div>风后侍侧。是三阶<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_134_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/269/Comments/0")'>砥平</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1366892_comment'></div>而皇猷允塞。岂比夫子虚上林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1366892_comment'></div>长杨羽猎。计麋鹿之多少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1366892_comment'></div>誇苑囿之大小者哉。方将延荣光于后昆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1366892_comment'></div>轶元风于邃古。拥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_138_1366892", 1366892, "Clauses/277/Comments/0")'>嘉瑞</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1366892_comment'></div>臻元符。登封于太山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1366892_comment'></div>篆德于社首。岂不与乎七十二帝同条而共贯哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1366892_comment'></div>君王于是回蜺旌。返銮舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1366892_comment'></div>访广成于至道。问大隗之幽居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1366892_comment'></div>使罔象掇元珠于赤水。天下不知其所如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1366892_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_144_1366892_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在成都，有诗。作品：《春感》<div id='poem_25743' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_25743' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/25743?labeling=true' target='_blank'>春感诗<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span 白隐居戴天大匡山，往来旁郡，依潼江赵徵君蕤。蕤亦节士，任侠有气，善为纵横学，著书号《长短经》。白从学岁馀，去游成都，赋此诗。益州刺史苏颋见而异之。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_25743'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_25743_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_25743'>尘萦游子面，蝶弄美人钗。<div id='poem_sentence_2_25743_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_25743'>却忆青山上，云门掩竹斋。<div id='poem_sentence_3_25743_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_25743'></div><div -----title
重庆（巴县）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='e8aeeb1e675f44fb88aaa5ee04c8afbf_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e8aeeb1e675f44fb88aaa5ee04c8afbf");'><span id='e8aeeb1e675f44fb88aaa5ee04c8afbf_link' -----title
江陵
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='4ac2d96d2a5c491fb3aa5a67dff7e264_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("4ac2d96d2a5c491fb3aa5a67dff7e264");'><span id='4ac2d96d2a5c491fb3aa5a67dff7e264_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=725&endYear=725')">725年</a>，25岁</div><div id='4ac2d96d2a5c491fb3aa5a67dff7e264' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至江陵，遇道士司马承祯，有赋。作品：《大鹏赋（并序）》<span class='inlineComment2'>（郁贤皓主张此赋初作于开元十二、三年间出蜀至江陵时，于天宝二年供奉翰林时改写，见《李太白全集校注》第3527页。）</span><div id='poem_1366893' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366893' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366893?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大鹏赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（725年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366893")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366893_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1366893'>予昔于江陵见天台司马子微。谓予有仙风道骨。可与神游八极之表。因著大鹏遇希有鸟赋以自广。此赋已传于世。往往人间见之。悔其少作。未穷宏达之旨。中年弃之。及读晋书。睹阮宣子大鹏赞。鄙心陋之。遂更记忆。多将旧本不同。今腹存手集。岂敢传诸作者。庶可示之子弟而已。其辞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1366893_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366893'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366893'>南华老仙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366893_comment'></div>发天机于漆园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366893_comment'></div>吐峥嵘之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1366893", 1366893, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>高论</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366893_comment'></div>开浩荡之奇言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366893_comment'></div>徵至怪于齐谐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366893_comment'></div>谈北溟之巨鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366893_comment'></div>吾不知其几千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366893_comment'></div>其名曰鲲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366893_comment'></div>化成大鹏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366893_comment'></div>质凝胚浑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366893_comment'></div>脱鬐鬣于海岛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366893_comment'></div>张羽毛于天门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366893_comment'></div>刷渤澥之春流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366893_comment'></div>晞扶桑之朝暾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366893_comment'></div>烜赫乎宇宙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366893_comment'></div>凭陵乎昆崙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366893_comment'></div>一鼓一舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366893_comment'></div>烟蒙沙昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366893_comment'></div>五岳为之震荡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366893_comment'></div>百川为之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1366893", 1366893, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>崩奔</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366893_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1366893", 1366893, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>尔乃</span>蹶厚地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366893_comment'></div>摩太清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366893_comment'></div>亘层霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366893_comment'></div>突重溟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1366893_comment'></div>激三千以崛起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1366893_comment'></div>搏九万而迅征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1366893_comment'></div>背嶪太山之崔嵬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1366893_comment'></div>翼举长云之纵横。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1366893_comment'></div>左回右旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1366893_comment'></div>倏阴忽明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1366893_comment'></div>历汗漫以夭矫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1366893_comment'></div>排阊阖之峥嵘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1366893_comment'></div>鸿濛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1366893_comment'></div>扇雷霆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1366893_comment'></div>斗转而天动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1366893_comment'></div>山摇而海倾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1366893_comment'></div>怒无所搏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1366893_comment'></div>雄无所争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1366893_comment'></div>固可想像其势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1366893_comment'></div>髣髴其形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1366893_comment'></div>若乃足萦虹蜺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1366893_comment'></div>目耀日月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1366893_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1366893", 1366893, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>连轩</span>沓拖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1366893_comment'></div>挥霍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1366893", 1366893, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>翕忽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1366893_comment'></div>喷气则六合生云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1366893_comment'></div>洒毛则千里飞雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1366893_comment'></div>邈彼北荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1366893_comment'></div>将穷南图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1366893_comment'></div>运<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1366893", 1366893, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>逸翰</span>以傍击。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1366893_comment'></div>鼓奔飙而长驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1366893_comment'></div>烛龙衔光以照物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1366893_comment'></div>忽腾覆以回旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1366893_comment'></div>则霞廓而雾散。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1366893_comment'></div>巨鳌冠山而却走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1366893_comment'></div>长鲸腾海而下驰。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1366893_comment'></div>既服御于灵仙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1366893_comment'></div>久<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_95_1366893", 1366893, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>驯扰</span>于池隍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1366893_comment'></div>精卫殷勤于衔木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1366893_comment'></div>鶢鶋悲愁乎荐觞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1366893_comment'></div>天鸡警晓于蟠桃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1366893_comment'></div>踆乌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_99_1366893", 1366893, "Clauses/99/Comments/0")'>晢耀</span>于太阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1366893_comment'></div>不旷荡而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_100_1366893", 1366893, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>纵适</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1366893_comment'></div>何拘挛而守常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1366893_comment'></div>未若兹鹏之逍遥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1366893_comment'></div>无厥类乎比方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1366893_comment'></div>不矜大而暴猛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1366893_comment'></div>每顺时而行藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1366893_comment'></div>参元根以比寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1366893_comment'></div>饮元气以为浆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1366893_comment'></div>戏旸谷而徘徊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1366893_comment'></div>冯炎洲而抑扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1366893_comment'></div>俄而希有见而谓之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1366893_comment'></div>伟哉鹏乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1366893_comment'></div>若此之乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1366893_comment'></div>吾右翼掩乎西极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1366893_comment'></div>左翼蔽乎东荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1366893_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_115_1366893", 1366893, "Clauses/115/Comments/0")'>跨蹑</span>地络。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1366893_comment'></div>周旋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_116_1366893", 1366893, "Clauses/116/Comments/0")'>天纲</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1366893_comment'></div>以恍惚为巢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1366893_comment'></div>以虚无为场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1366893_comment'></div>我呼尔游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1366893_comment'></div>尔呼我翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1366893_comment'></div>于是乎大鹏许之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1366893_comment'></div>欣然相随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1366893_comment'></div>此二禽巳登于寥廓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1366893_comment'></div>而斥鴳之辈空见笑于藩篱。</div><div 九江（浔阳）

onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5998, "poem_allusion_26013")'>鲁连</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_26013_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_26013'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_26013'>英王受庙略，秉钺清南边。<div id='poem_sentence_3_26013_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_26013'>云旗卷海雪，金戟罗江烟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1366954_comment'></div>惟神包括乾坤。平准天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366954_comment'></div>划三峡以中断。疏九道以争奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366954_comment'></div>惟神使阳侯卷波。羲和奉命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366954_comment'></div>楼船先济。士马无虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366954_comment'></div>扫妖孽于幽燕。斩鲸鲵于河洛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366954_comment'></div>惟神祐我。降休于民。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366901_comment'></div>臣诚惶诚恐顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366901_comment'></div>臣闻社稷无常奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366901_comment'></div>明者守之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366901_comment'></div>君臣无定位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366901_comment'></div>闇者失之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366901_comment'></div>所以父作子述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366901_comment'></div>重光叠辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366901_comment'></div>天未绝晋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366901_comment'></div>人惟戴唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366901_comment'></div>以功德有厚薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366901_comment'></div>运数有修短。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366901_comment'></div>功高而福祚长永。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366901_comment'></div>德薄而政教陵迟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366901_comment'></div>三后之姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366901_comment'></div>于今为庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1366901_comment'></div>屠割黎庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1366901_comment'></div>女弟席宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1366901_comment'></div>倾国弄权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1366901_comment'></div>九土泉货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1366901_comment'></div>尽归其室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1366901_comment'></div>怨气上激。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1366901_comment'></div>水旱荐臻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1366901_comment'></div>重罹暴乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1366901_comment'></div>百姓力屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1366901_comment'></div>即欲平殄蝥贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1366901_comment'></div>恐难应期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1366901_comment'></div>且图万全之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1366901_comment'></div>以成一举之策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1366901_comment'></div>今自河以北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1366901_comment'></div>为胡所淩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1366901_comment'></div>自河之南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1366901_comment'></div>孤城四垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1366901_comment'></div>大盗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_81_1366901", 1366901, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>蚕食</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1366901_comment'></div>割为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_82_1366901", 1366901, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>洪沟</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1366901_comment'></div>宇宙峣杌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1366901_comment'></div>昭然可睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1366901_comment'></div>臣伏见金陵旧都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1366901_comment'></div>地称天险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1366901_comment'></div>龙盘虎踞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1366901_comment'></div>关扃自然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1366901_comment'></div>六代皇居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1366901_comment'></div>五福斯在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1366901_comment'></div>雄图霸迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1366901_comment'></div>隐轸犹存。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1366901_comment'></div>避地东吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1366901_comment'></div>永嘉南迁。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1366901_comment'></div>典谟训诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1366901_comment'></div>不以为非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1366901_comment'></div>卫文徙居楚邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1366901_comment'></div>风人流咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1366901_comment'></div>伏惟陛下因万人之荡析。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1366901_comment'></div>乘六合之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_106_1366901", id='poem_sentence_107_1366901_comment'></div>就金陵太山必安之成策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1366901_comment'></div>苟利于物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1366901_comment'></div>断在宸衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1366901_comment'></div>况齿革羽毛之所生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1366901_comment'></div>楩楠豫章之所出。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1366901_comment'></div>横制八极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1366901_comment'></div>克复两京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1366901_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1366902' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366902' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366902?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为宋中丞自荐表</a><span class='authorDate'>（757年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366902")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366902_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366902'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366902'>臣某闻天地闭而贤人隐。云雷屯而君子用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366902_comment'></div>臣伏见前翰林供奉李白。年五十有七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366902_comment'></div>天宝初五府交辟。不求闻达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366902_comment'></div>亦由子真谷口。名动京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366902_comment'></div>上皇闻而悦之。召入禁掖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366902_comment'></div>既润色于鸿业。或间草于王言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366902_comment'></div>雍容揄扬。特见褒赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366902_comment'></div>为贱臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1366902", 1366902, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>诈诡</span>。遂放归山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366902_comment'></div>閒居制作。言盈数万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366902_comment'></div>属逆胡暴乱。避地庐山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366902_comment'></div>遇永王东巡胁行。中道奔走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366902_comment'></div>却至彭泽。具已陈首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366902_comment'></div>前后经宣慰大使崔涣及臣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1366902", 1366902, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>推覆</span>清雪。寻经奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366902_comment'></div>臣闻古之诸侯。进贤受上赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366902_comment'></div>蔽贤受显戮。若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1366902", 1366902, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>三适</span>称美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366902_comment'></div>必九锡光荣。垂之典谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366902_comment'></div>永以为训。臣所管李白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366902_comment'></div>实审无辜。怀经济之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366902_comment'></div>抗巢由之节。文可以变风俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366902_comment'></div>学可以究天人。一命不沾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366902_comment'></div>四海称屈。伏惟陛下大明广运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366902_comment'></div>至道无偏。收其希世之英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366902_comment'></div>以为清朝之宝。昔四皓遭高皇而不起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366902_comment'></div>翼惠帝而方来。君臣离合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1366902_comment'></div>亦各有数。岂使此人名扬宇宙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1366902_comment'></div>而枯槁当年。传曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1366902_comment'></div>举逸人而天下归心。伏惟陛下回太阳之高晖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1366902_comment'></div>流覆盆之下照。特请拜一京官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1366902_comment'></div>献可替否。以光朝列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1366902_comment'></div>则四海豪俊。引领知归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1366902_comment'></div>不胜慺慺之至。敢陈荐以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1366902_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1366902_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a id='poem_sentence_6_25863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_25863'>青桂隐遥月，绿枫鸣愁猿。<div id='poem_sentence_7_25863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_25863'>水碧或可采，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_25863", 25863, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>金精</span>秘莫论。<div id='poem_sentence_8_25863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_25863'>吾将学仙去，冀与琴高言<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_25863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_25863'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_25863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_25863'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_25863_0'>⑴ 一作《过彭蠡湖》云：“谢公入彭蠡，因此游松门。余方窥石镜，兼得穷江源。前赏迹可见，后来道空存。而欲继风雅，岂惟清心魂。云海方助兴，波涛何足论。青嶂忆遥月，绿萝鸣愁猿。水碧或可采，金膏秘莫言。余将振衣去，羽化出嚣烦。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_25863_comment'></div></div><br /></div><div id='poem_sentence_1_26065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_26065'>沧波眇川汜，白日隐天末。<div id='poem_sentence_2_26065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366948?labeling=true' target='_blank'>天门山铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（748年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366948")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1366948_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366948'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366948'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1366948", 1366948, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>梁山</span>博望，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1366948", 1366948, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>关扃</span>楚滨。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1366948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1366948'>夹据洪流，实为吴津。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1366948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1366948'>两坐错落，如鲸张鳞。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1366948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1366948'>惟海有若，惟川有神。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1366948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1366948'>牛渚怪物，目围车轮。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1366948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1366948'>光射岛屿，气淩星辰。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1366948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1366948'>卷沙扬涛，溺马杀人。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1366948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1366948'>国泰呈瑞，时讹返珍。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1366948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1366948'>开则九江纳锡，闭则五岳飞尘。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1366948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1366948'>天险之地，无德匪亲。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1366948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1366948'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1366948_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1366947' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366947' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366947?labeling=true' target='_blank'>化城寺大钟铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（748年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366947")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366947_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1366947'>噫。天以震雷鼓群动。佛以鸣钟警大梦。而能发挥沈潜。开觉茫蠢。则钟之取象。其义博哉。夫扬音大千。所以清真心。警俗虑。协响广乐。所以达元气。彰天声。铭勋皇宫。所以旌丰功。昭茂德。莫不配美金鼎。增辉宝坊。仍事作制。岂徒然也。粤有唐宣城郡当涂县化城寺大钟者。量函千钧。声盈万壑。盖邑宰李公之所创也。公名有则。系元元之英蕤。茂列圣之天枝。生于公族。贵而秀出。少蕴才略。壮而有成。西逾流沙。立功绝域。帝畴乎厥庸。始学古从政。历宰洁白。声闻于天。天书褒荣。辉之简牍。稽首三复。子孙其传。天宝之初。鸣琴此邦。不言而治。日计之无近功。岁计之有大利。物不知化。潜臻小康。神明其道。越不可尚。方入于禅关。睹天宫峥嵘。闻钟声琐屑。乃谓诸龙象曰。曷不建大法鼓。树之层台。使群聋六时。有所归仰。不亦美乎。于是发一言以先觉。举百里而咸应。秋毫不挫。人多子来。铜崇朝而山积。工不日而云集。今乃采凫氏。撰鸣钟。火天地之炉。扇阴阳之炭。回禄奋怒。飞廉震惊。金精转涾以融熠。铜液星荧而㸌𤐰。光喷日道。气歊天维。红云点于太清。紫烟矗于遥海。烜赫宇宙。功侔鬼神。莹而察之。吁可骇也。尔其龙质炳发。虎形躨跜。縻金索以上絙。悬宝楼而迭击。傍振万壑。高闻九天。声动山以隐隐。响奔雷而阗阗。救汤镬于幽途。息剑轮于苦海。景福肸蚃。被于人天。非李公好谋而成。宏济群物。又孰能与于此乎。丞尉等并衣冠之龟龙。人物之标准。大雅君子。同僚尽心。闻善贾勇。赞成厥美。寺主升朝。閒心古容。英骨秀气。洒落毫素。谦柔笑言。海受水而皆纳。镜无形而不烛。直道妙用。乃如是然。常虚怀忘情。洁已利物。是人行空寂不动。见如来有若。上座灵隐。都维𨚗则舒。名僧日晖蕴虚常因调护。贤哉六开士。普闻八万法。深入禅惠。精修律仪。将博我以文章。求我以述作。功德大海。酌而难名。遂与六曹豪吏。姑熟贤老。乃缁乃黄。凫趋梵庭。请扬宰君之鸿美。白昔忝侍从。备于辞臣。恭承德音。敢阙清风之颂。其辞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1366947_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366947'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366947'>雄雄鸿钟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1366947", 1366947, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>砰隐</span>天。雷鼓霆击警大千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366947_comment'></div>含号烜赫声无边。摧慑魑魅招灵仙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366947_comment'></div>傍极六道下九泉。剑轮辍苦期息肩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366947_comment'></div>汤镬猛火停炽然。恺悌贤宰人父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366947_comment'></div>兴功利物信可久。传芳金钟永不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366947_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1366947_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='1280464f793b4954aef082ce9793c8b5_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1280464f793b4954aef082ce9793c8b5");'><span id='1280464f793b4954aef082ce9793c8b5_link' id='poem_content_1366915'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366915'>通驿公馆南有水亭焉。四甍翚飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366915_comment'></div>巉绝浦屿。盖有前摄令河东嶭公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366915_comment'></div>栋而宇之。今宰陇西李公明化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366915_comment'></div>开物成务。又横其梁而阁之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366915_comment'></div>昼鸣閒琴。夕酌清月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366915_comment'></div>盖为接輶轩祖远客之佳境也。制置既久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366915_comment'></div>莫知何名。司马武公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366915_comment'></div>长材博古。独映方外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366915_comment'></div>因据胡床。岸帻啸咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366915_comment'></div>而谓前长史李公及诸公曰。此亭跨姑熟之水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366915_comment'></div>可称为姑熟亭焉。嘉名<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1366915", 1366915, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>胜概</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366915_comment'></div>自我作也。且夫曹官绂冕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366915_comment'></div>大贤处之。若游青山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366915_comment'></div>卧白云。逍遥偃傲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366915_comment'></div>何适不可。小才居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366915_comment'></div>窘而自拘。悄若桎梏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366915_comment'></div>则清风朗月。河英岳秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366915_comment'></div>皆为弃物。安得称焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366915_comment'></div>所以司马南邻。当文章之旗鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366915_comment'></div>翰林客卿。挥<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1366915", 1366915, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>辞锋</span>以战胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366915_comment'></div>名教乐地。无非得俊之场也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366915_comment'></div>千载一时。言诗记志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366915_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1366915_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='fc188a05257a43d1b1fbfc57f93ecaa5_label'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=756&endYear=756')">756年春</a>　在当涂，闻玄宗将亲征安禄山，有文。作品：《春于姑熟送赵四流炎方序》<div id='poem_1366912' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366912' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366912?labeling=true' target='_blank'>春于姑熟送赵四流炎方序</a><span class='authorDate'>（756年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366912")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366912_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366912'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366912'>白以邹鲁多鸿儒。燕赵饶壮士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366912_comment'></div>盖风土之然乎。赵少公才貌瑰雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366912_comment'></div>志气豪烈。以黄绶作尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366912_comment'></div>泥蟠当涂。亦犹鸡栖鹤笼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366912_comment'></div>不足以窘束鸾凤耳。以疾恶抵法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366912_comment'></div>迁于炎方。辞高堂而坠心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366912_comment'></div>指绝国以摇恨。天与水远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366912_comment'></div>云连山长。惜光景于顷刻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366912_comment'></div>开壶觞于洲渚。黄鹤晓别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366912_comment'></div>愁闻命子之声。青枫暝色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366912_comment'></div>尽是伤心之树。然自吴瞻秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366912_comment'></div>日见喜气。上当攫玉弩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366912_comment'></div>摧狼狐。洗清天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366912_comment'></div>雷雨必作。冀白日回照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366912_comment'></div>丹心可明。巴陵半道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366912_comment'></div>坐见还吴之棹。令雪解而松柏振色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366912_comment'></div>气和而兰蕙开芳。仆西登天门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366912_comment'></div>望子于沧江之上。吾贤可流水其道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366912_comment'></div>浮云其身。通方大适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366912_comment'></div>何往不可。何戚戚于路歧哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366912_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1366912_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='61e1b6693e564272b095781a1f40f79c_label'><a id='poem_sentence_2_25670'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_25670_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>将去金陵，有诗赠僧人。作品：《登梅岗望金陵赠族侄高座寺僧中孚》<span id='poem_sentence_1_26400_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_26400'>群峰如逐鹿，奔走相驰突。<div id='poem_sentence_2_26400_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_26400'>江水<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_26400", 26400, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>九道</span>来，云端遥明没。<div id='poem_sentence_3_26400_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_26400'>时迁大运去，龙虎势休歇。<div id='poem_sentence_4_26400_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_26400'>我来属天清，登览穷楚越。<div id='poem_sentence_5_26400_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_26400'>吾宗挺禅伯，特秀鸾凤骨<span id='poem_sentence_16_26400'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_26400_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>将去金陵，有诗答僧人。作品：《答族侄僧中孚赠玉泉仙人掌茶（并序）》<div id='poem_26407' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_26407' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/26407?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答族侄僧中孚赠玉泉仙人掌茶</a><span class='authorDate'>（747年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_26407")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_26407_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_26407'>余闻荆州玉泉寺近清溪诸山，山洞往往有乳窟。窟中多玉泉交流，其中有白蝙蝠，大如鸦。按仙经，蝙蝠一名仙鼠，千岁之后，体白如雪，栖则倒悬，盖饮乳水而长生也。其水边处处有茗草罗生，枝叶如碧玉，唯玉泉真公常采而饮之。年八十馀岁，颜色如桃李。而此茗清香滑熟，异于他者，所以能还童振枯，扶人寿也。余游金陵，见宗僧中孚，示余茶数十片，拳然重叠，其状如手，号为仙人掌茶。盖新出乎玉泉之山，旷古未觌，因持之见遗，兼赠诗，要余答之，遂有此作。后之高僧大隐，知仙掌茶发乎中孚禅子及青莲居士李白也。</div><div id='poem_preface_26407_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_26407'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1078, "poem_allusion_26407")'>西子</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(8919, "poem_allusion_26407")'>无盐</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_26407_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/26227?labeling=true' target='_blank'>相和歌辞 君道曲<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（749年）</span><span class='poemContent' id='poem_content_26431'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_26431'>潮水定可信，天风难与期。<div id='poem_sentence_0_26431_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_26431_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_26431'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_26431_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_26431'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_26431_0'>⑴ 一本题作《金陵阻风雪书怀寄杨江宁》云：“潮水定可信，天风难与期。清晨西北转，薄暮东南吹。以此难挂席，沿洄颇淹迟。使索金陵书，又叨贤宰知。弦歌止过客，惠化闻京师。岁物忽如此，我来复几时。纷纷江上雪，草草客中悲。明发新林浦，空吟谢朓诗。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_26431_comment'></div></div><br /><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=754&endYear=754')">754年5月</a>　在扬州与魏万相遇，并携万到金陵同游。别时，互赠诗，并尽出其诗文，嘱魏万编集。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=754&endYear=754')">754年</a>　在金陵，有诗送别魏万。作品：《送王屋山人魏万还王屋（并序）》<div id='poem_26274' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_26274' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/26274?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送王屋山人魏万还王屋</a><span class='authorDate'>（754年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_26274")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_26274_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_26274'>王屋山人魏万，云自嵩宋沿吴相访，数千里不遇。乘兴游台越，经永嘉，观谢公石门，后于广陵相见。美其爱文好古，浪迹方外，因述其行，而赠是诗（见王屋山人魏万，云自嵩历兖。游梁入吴，计程三千里，相访不遇。因下江东，寻诸名山，往复百越，后于广陵一面，遂乘兴共过金陵。此公爱奇好古，独出物表，因述其行李，遂有此作。）。</div><div id='poem_preface_26274_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_26274'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(179, "poem_allusion_26274")'>八咏楼</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(782, "poem_allusion_26274")'>辩折田巴</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1192, "poem_allusion_26274")'>曹娥碑</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4844, "poem_allusion_26274")'>金华松子</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_26274_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_26274'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_26274'>仙人东方生，浩荡弄云海。<div id='poem_sentence_0_26274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_26274'><span id='poem_sentence_1_26274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_26274'>魏侯继大名，本家聊摄城。<div id='poem_sentence_2_26274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_26274'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_26274", 26274, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>朅来</span>游嵩峰，羽客何双双。<div id='poem_sentence_8_26274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_26274'>朝携月光子，暮宿玉女窗。<div id='poem_sentence_9_26274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_26274'>鬼谷上窈窕，龙潭下奔潨。<div id='poem_sentence_10_26274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_26274'>东浮汴河水，访我三千里。<div id='poem_sentence_11_26274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_26274'>逸兴满吴云，飘飖浙江汜。<div id='poem_sentence_12_26274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_26274'>挥手杭越间，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_26274", 26274, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>樟亭</span>望潮还。<div id='poem_sentence_13_26274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_26274'>涛卷海门石，云横天际山。<div id='poem_sentence_14_26274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_26274'>白马走素车，雷奔骇心颜。<div id='poem_sentence_15_26274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_26274'>遥闻会稽美，且度<span id='poem_sentence_17_26274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_26274'>秀色不可名，清辉满江城。<div id='poem_sentence_18_26274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_26274'>人游月边去，舟在空中行。<div id='poem_sentence_19_26274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_26274'>此中久延伫，入剡寻<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_21_26274'>笑读<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1192, "poem_sentence_21_26274")'>曹娥碑</span>，沈吟黄绢语。<div id='poem_sentence_21_26274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_26274'>天台连四明，日入向国清。<div id='poem_sentence_22_26274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_26274'>五峰转月色，百里行松声。<div "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>灵溪</span>咨沿越，华顶殊超忽。<div id='poem_sentence_24_26274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_26274'>石梁横青天，侧足履半月。<div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366928_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366928'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366928'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1366928", 1366928, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>斯高</span>柄秦。嬴世不二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366928_comment'></div>三杰伏草。与汉并出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366928_comment'></div>莽夷朱晖。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1366928", 1366928, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>耿邓</span>乃起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366928_comment'></div>我君六叶继圣。熙乎元风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366928_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1366928", 1366928, class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1366928", 1366928, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>商钓</span>。四座名哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366928_comment'></div>皆清朝旅人。吾稀风广成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366928_comment'></div>荡漾浮世。素受宝诀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366928_comment'></div>为三十六帝之外臣。即四明逸老贺知章呼余为谪仙人。<div class='inline' id='poem_title_1366903' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366903?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为吴王谢责赴行在迟滞表</a><span class='authorDate'>（756年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_1366903_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366903'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366903'>臣某言。伏蒙圣恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366903_comment'></div>追赴行在。臣诚惶诚恐顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366903_comment'></div>臣闻胡马矫首。嘶北风以跼顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366903_comment'></div>越禽归飞。恋南枝而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1366903", 1366903, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>刷羽</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366903_comment'></div>所以流波思其旧浦。落叶坠于本根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366903_comment'></div>在物尚然。矧于臣子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366903_comment'></div>臣位叨磐石。辜负明时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366903_comment'></div>才阙总戎。谬当强寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366903_comment'></div>驽拙有素。天实知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366903_comment'></div>伏惟陛下重纽乾纲。再清国步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366903_comment'></div>慜臣不逮。赐臣生全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366903_comment'></div>归见白日。死无遗恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366903_comment'></div>然臣年过耳顺。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1366903", 1366903, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>风瘵</span>日加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366903_comment'></div>锋镝残骸。劣有馀喘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366903_comment'></div>虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1366903", 1366903, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>决力</span>上道。而心与愿违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366903_comment'></div>贵贪尺寸之程。转增犬马之恋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366903_comment'></div>非有他故。以疾淹留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366903_comment'></div>今大举天兵。扫除戎羯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366903_comment'></div>所在邮驿。徵发交驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366903_comment'></div>臣逐便水行。难于陆进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366903_comment'></div>瞻望丹阙。心魂若飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366903_comment'></div>惭<span id='poem_sentence_21_1366903_comment'></div>不胜涕恋屏营之至。谨奉表以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366903_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1366903_comment'></div></div></div><br id='poem_sentence_4_25809_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=761&endYear=761')">761年</a>　在金陵，有文。作品：《为窦氏小师祭璿和尚文》《金陵名僧頵公粉图慈亲赞》《志公画赞》<div id='poem_1366955' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366955' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366955?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为窦氏小师祭璿和尚文</a><span class='authorDate'>（761年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366955")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366955_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366955'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366955'>年月日。某谨以斋蔬之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366955_comment'></div>敢昭告于和尚之灵。伏惟和尚降灵自天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366955_comment'></div>依化游世。角立独出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366955_comment'></div>嶷然生知。凤凰开九苞之翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366955_comment'></div>豫章横万顷之陂。始传灯而纳照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366955_comment'></div>因落发以从师。迈龙象以蹴踏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366955_comment'></div>为天人之羽仪。绍释风于西域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366955_comment'></div>回佛日于东维。若大块之噫气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366955_comment'></div>鼓和风而一吹。热恼清洒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366955_comment'></div>道芽荣滋。走吴楚以宗仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366955_comment'></div>将扫地而归之。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366955_comment'></div>来无所从。去复何适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366955_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1366955", 1366955, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>水还火归</span>。萧散本宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366955_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1366955", 1366955, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>宝舟</span>辍棹。禅月掩魄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366955_comment'></div>痛一往而无踪。怆双林之变白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366955_comment'></div>某早乘训诲。偏倚恩慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366955_comment'></div>忝餐风于法侣。旋落荫于禅枝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366955_comment'></div>号无辍响。泣有馀悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366955_comment'></div>手撰茗药。精诚严思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366955_comment'></div>冀神道之昭格。庶明灵而飨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366955_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1366955_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1366945' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366945' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_1_1366945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1366945'>粉为造化，笔写天真。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1366945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366925'>夫功未足以盖世。威不可以震主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366925_comment'></div>必挟此者。持之安归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366925_comment'></div>所以彭越醢于前。韩信诛于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366925_comment'></div>况权位不及于此者。虚生危疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366925_comment'></div>而潜包祸心。小拒王命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366925_comment'></div>是以谋臣将啖以节钺。诱而烹之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366925_comment'></div>亦由借鸿涛于奔鲸。鲙生人于哮虎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366925_comment'></div>呼吸江海。横流百川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366925_comment'></div>左萦右拂。十有馀郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366925_comment'></div>国讨未及。谁当其锋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366925_comment'></div>我副使李公。勇冠三军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366925_comment'></div>众无一旅。横倚天之剑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366925_comment'></div>挥驻日之戈。吟啸四顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366925_comment'></div>熊罴雨集。蒙轮扛鼎之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366925_comment'></div>杖干将而星罗。上可以决天云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366925_comment'></div>下可以绝地维。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1366925", 1366925, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>翕振</span><span class='link' id='poem_sentence_16_1366925_comment'></div>进若电逝。转战百胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366925_comment'></div>僵尸盈川。水膏于沧溟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366925_comment'></div>陆血于原野。一扫瓦解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366925_comment'></div>洗清全吴。可谓万里长城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366925_comment'></div>横断楚塞。不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366925_comment'></div>五岭之北。尽饵于修蛇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366925_comment'></div>势盘地蹙。不可图也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1366925_comment'></div>而功大用小。天高路遐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1366925_comment'></div>社稷虽定于刘章。封侯未施于李广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1366925_comment'></div>使慷慨之士。长吁青云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1366925_comment'></div>良牧出祖。列将登筵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1366925_comment'></div>歌酣易水之风。气振武安之瓦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1366925_comment'></div>海日夜色。云帆中流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1366925_comment'></div>席阑赋诗。以壮三军之士。<div class='inline' 扬州

id='poem_sentence_11_26176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_26176'>好鸟集<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_26176", 26176, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>珍木</span>，高才列华堂。<div id='poem_sentence_12_26176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_26176'>时从府中归，丝管俨成行。<div id='poem_sentence_13_26176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_26176'>但苦隔远道，无由共衔觞。<div id='poem_sentence_14_26176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_26176'>江北荷花开，江南<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_26176", 26176, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>杨梅</span>熟。<div id='poem_sentence_15_26176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_26176'>正好饮酒时，怀贤在心目。<div id='poem_sentence_16_26176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_26176'>挂席拾海月，乘风下长川。<div id='poem_sentence_17_26176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_26176'>多沽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_26176", 26176, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>新丰</span>醁，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_26176", 26176, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>满载</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_26176", 26176, "Clauses/37/Comments/1")'>剡溪船</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_18_26176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_26176'>中途不遇人，直到尔门前。<div id='poem_sentence_19_26176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_26176'>大笑同一醉，取乐平生年<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_20_26176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_26176'></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_26176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_26176'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_20_26176_0'>⑴ 一本作“太伯让天下，仲雍扬波涛。清风荡万古，迹与星辰高。开吴食东溟，陆氏世英髦。夫子特峻秀，岳立冠人曹。风流少年时，京洛事游遨。骖驔红阳燕，玉剑明珠袍。一诺许他人，千金双错刀。满堂青云士，望美期丹霄。我昔北门厄，摧如一枝蒿。有虎挟鸡徒，连延五陵豪。邀遮来组织，呵吓相煎熬。君披万人丛，脱我如𤠞牢。此耻竟未刷，且食绥山桃。非天雨文章，所祖托风骚。苍蓬老壮发，长策未逢遭。别君几何时，君无相思否。鸣琴坐高楼，绿水净窗牖。政成闻雅颂，人吏皆拱手。投刃有馀地，回车摄江阳。错杂非易理，先威挫豪强。城门何肃穆，五月飞秋霜。好鸟集珍木，高才列华堂。时从府中归，丝管俨成行。但苦隔远道，无由共衔觞。江北荷花开，江南杨梅鲜。挂席拾海月，乘风下长川。多沽新丰醁，满载剡溪船。中途不遇人，直到尔门前。大笑同一醉，取乐平生年。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_26176_comment'></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='9b85d3be3e044688a119a7b6b013824a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9b85d3be3e044688a119a7b6b013824a");'><span 嵊州（剡县）

gray;'>▪</span>春游襄阳，谒韩朝宗，有文。作品：《上韩荆州书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（吕华明主张此文作于开元二十三年，见《李太白年谱补正》第205页；安旗题作“与韩荆州书”，见《李白全集编年笺注》第1775页。）</span><div id='poem_1366906' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366906' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366906?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与韩荆州书</a><span class='authorDate'>（734年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366906")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366906_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366906'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366906'>白闻天下谈士相聚而言曰。生不用封万户侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366906_comment'></div>但愿一识韩荆州。何令人之景慕一至于此耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366906_comment'></div>岂不以有周公之风。躬吐握之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366906_comment'></div>使海内豪俊奔走而归之。一登龙门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366906_comment'></div>则声价十倍。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1366906", 1366906, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>所以</span>龙蟠凤逸之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366906_comment'></div>皆欲收名定价于君侯。愿君侯不以富贵而骄之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366906_comment'></div>寒贱而忽之。则三千宾中有毛遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366906_comment'></div>使白得脱颖而出。即其人焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366906_comment'></div>白陇西布衣。流落楚汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366906_comment'></div>十五好剑术。遍干诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366906_comment'></div>三十成文章。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1366906", 1366906, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>历抵</span>卿相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366906_comment'></div>虽长不满七尺。而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1366906", 1366906, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>心雄万夫</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366906_comment'></div>王公大臣。许与气义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366906_comment'></div>此<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1366906", 1366906, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>畴曩</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1366906", 1366906, "Clauses/26/Comments/1")'>心迹</span>。安敢不尽于君侯哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366906_comment'></div>君侯制作侔神明。德行动天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366906_comment'></div>笔参造化。学究天人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366906_comment'></div>幸愿开张心颜。不以长揖见拒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366906_comment'></div>必若接之以高宴。纵之以清谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366906_comment'></div>请<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1366906", 1366906, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>日试万言</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1366906", 1366906, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>倚马可待</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366906_comment'></div>今天下以君侯为文章之司命。人物之权衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366906_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1366906", 1366906, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>一经</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1366906", 1366906, "Clauses/40/Comments/1")'>品题</span>。便作佳士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366906_comment'></div>而君侯何惜阶前盈尺之地。不使白<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1366906", 1366906, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>扬眉吐气</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366906_comment'></div>激昂青云耶。昔王子师为豫章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366906_comment'></div>未下车即辟荀慈明。既下车又辟孔文举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1366906_comment'></div>山涛作冀州。甄拔三十馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1366906_comment'></div>或为侍中尚书。先代所美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1366906_comment'></div>而君侯亦一荐严协律。入为秘书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1366906_comment'></div>中间崔宗之房习祖黎昕许莹之徒。或以才名见知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1366906_comment'></div>或以清白见赏。白每观其衔恩抚躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1366906_comment'></div>忠义奋发。白以此感激。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1366906_comment'></div>知君侯推赤心于诸贤之腹中。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1366906", 1366906, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>所以</span>不归他人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1366906_comment'></div>而愿委身于国士。傥急难有用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1366906_comment'></div>敢效微躯。且人非尧舜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1366906_comment'></div>谁能尽善。白谟猷筹画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1366906_comment'></div>安敢自矜。至于制作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1366906_comment'></div>积成卷轴。则欲尘秽视听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1366906_comment'></div>恐雕虫小技。不合大人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1366906_comment'></div>若赐观刍荛。请给以纸笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1366906_comment'></div>兼之书人。然后退扫閒轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1366906_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1366906", 1366906, -----title
安陆
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='39cb8c8abe4f49b8b5ca633081889082_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("39cb8c8abe4f49b8b5ca633081889082");'><span id='39cb8c8abe4f49b8b5ca633081889082_link'
