0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>婚故宰相许圉师孙女，遂家安陆。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>有文言志。作品：《代寿山答孟少府移文书》<div id='poem_1366909' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366909' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366909?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代寿山答孟少府移文书</a><span class='authorDate'>（727年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366909")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366909_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366909'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366909'>淮南小寿山谨使东峰金衣双鹤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366909_comment'></div>衔飞云锦书于维扬孟公足下曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366909_comment'></div>仆包大块之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366909_comment'></div>生洪荒之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366909_comment'></div>连翼轸之分野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366909_comment'></div>控荆衡之远势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366909_comment'></div>盘薄万古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366909_comment'></div>邈然星河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366909_comment'></div>凭天霓以结峰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366909_comment'></div>倚斗极而横嶂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366909_comment'></div>颇能攒吸霞雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366909_comment'></div>隐居灵仙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366909_comment'></div>产隋侯之明珠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366909_comment'></div>蓄卞氏之光宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366909_comment'></div>罄宇宙之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366909_comment'></div>殚造化之奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366909_comment'></div>方与昆崙抗行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366909_comment'></div>阆风接境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366909_comment'></div>何人间巫庐台霍之足陈耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366909_comment'></div>昨于山人李白处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366909_comment'></div>见吾子移白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366909_comment'></div>责仆以多奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366909_comment'></div>叱仆以特秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366909_comment'></div>而盛谈三山五岳之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1366909_comment'></div>谓仆小山无名无德而称焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1366909_comment'></div>观乎斯言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1366909_comment'></div>何太谬之甚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1366909_comment'></div>吾子岂不闻乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1366909_comment'></div>无名为天地之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1366909_comment'></div>有名为万物之母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1366909_comment'></div>假令登封禋祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1366909_comment'></div>曷足以大道讥耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1366909_comment'></div>然皆损人费物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1366909_comment'></div>庖杀致祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1366909_comment'></div>暴殄草木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1366909_comment'></div>镌刻金石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1366909_comment'></div>使载图典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1366909_comment'></div>亦未足为贵乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1366909_comment'></div>且达人庄生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1366909_comment'></div>常有馀论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1366909_comment'></div>以为斥鴳不羡于鹏鸟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1366909_comment'></div>秋毫可并于太山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1366909_comment'></div>由斯而谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1366909_comment'></div>何小大之殊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1366909_comment'></div>又怪于诸山藏国宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1366909_comment'></div>隐国贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1366909_comment'></div>使吾君<span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1366909_comment'></div>非<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1366909", 1366909, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>通谈</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1366909_comment'></div>夫皇王登极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1366909_comment'></div>瑞物昭至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1366909_comment'></div>蒲萄翡翠以纳贡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1366909_comment'></div>河图洛书以应符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1366909_comment'></div>设天纲而掩贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1366909_comment'></div>穷月竁以率职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1366909_comment'></div>天不秘宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1366909_comment'></div>地不藏珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1366909_comment'></div>风威百蛮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1366909_comment'></div>春养万物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1366909_comment'></div>王道无外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1366909_comment'></div>何英贤珍玉而能伏匿于岩穴耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1366909_comment'></div>所谓<span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1366909_comment'></div>驾君虬龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1366909_comment'></div>一朝飞腾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1366909_comment'></div>为方丈蓬莱之人耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1366909_comment'></div>此则未可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1366909_comment'></div>乃相与卷其丹书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1366909_comment'></div>匣其瑶琴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1366909_comment'></div>申管晏之谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1366909_comment'></div>谋帝王之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1366909_comment'></div>奋其智能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1366909_comment'></div>愿为辅弼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1366909_comment'></div>使寰区大定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1366909_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_122_1366909", 1366909, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>海县</span>清一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1366909_comment'></div>事君之道成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1366909_comment'></div>荣亲之义毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1366909_comment'></div>然后与陶朱留侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1366909_comment'></div>浮五湖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1366909_comment'></div>戏沧洲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1366909_comment'></div>不足为难矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1366909_comment'></div>即仆林下之所隐容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1366909_comment'></div>岂不大哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1366909_comment'></div>必能资其聪明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1366909_comment'></div>辅其正气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1366909_comment'></div>借之以物色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1366909_comment'></div>发之以文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1366909_comment'></div>虽烟花中贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1366909_comment'></div>没齿无恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1366909_comment'></div>其有山精木魅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1366909_comment'></div>雄虺猛兽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1366909_comment'></div>以驱之四荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1366909_comment'></div>磔裂原野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1366909_comment'></div>使影迹绝灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1366909_comment'></div>不干户庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1366909_comment'></div>亦遣清风扫门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1366909_comment'></div>明月侍坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1366909_comment'></div>此乃养贤之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1366909_comment'></div>实亦勤矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1366909_comment'></div>孟子孟子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1366909_comment'></div>无见深责耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1366909_comment'></div>明年青春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1366909_comment'></div>求我于此岩也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_150_1366909_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在安陆，有诗。作品：《南轩松》《静夜思》<span class='authorDate'>（729年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366904")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366904_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366904'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366904'>白嵚崎历落可笑人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366904_comment'></div>虽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366904_comment'></div>颇尝览千载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366904_comment'></div>观百家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366904_comment'></div>至于圣贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366904_comment'></div>相似厥众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366904_comment'></div>则有若似于仲尼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366904_comment'></div>纪信似于高祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366904_comment'></div>牢之似于无忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366904_comment'></div>宋玉似于屈原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366904_comment'></div>而遥观君侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366904_comment'></div>窃疑魏洽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366904_comment'></div>便欲趋就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366904_comment'></div>临然举鞭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366904_comment'></div>迟疑之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366904_comment'></div>未及回避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366904_comment'></div>且理有疑误而成过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366904_comment'></div>事有形似而类真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366904_comment'></div>惟大雅含宏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366904_comment'></div>方能恕之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366904_comment'></div>白少颇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1366904", 1366904, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>周慎</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366904_comment'></div>忝闻义方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366904_comment'></div>入暗室而无欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366904_comment'></div>属昏行而不变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1366904_comment'></div>今小人履疑误形似之迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1366904_comment'></div>君侯流恺悌矜恤之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1366904_comment'></div>戢秋霜之威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1366904_comment'></div>布冬日之爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1366904_comment'></div>睟容有穆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1366904_comment'></div>怒颜不彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1366904_comment'></div>虽将军息恨于长孙之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1366904_comment'></div>此无惭德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1366904_comment'></div>司空受揖于元淑之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1366904_comment'></div>彼未为贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1366904_comment'></div>一言见冤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1366904_comment'></div>九死非谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1366904_comment'></div>白孤剑谁托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1366904_comment'></div>悲歌自怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1366904_comment'></div>迫于悽惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1366904_comment'></div>席不暇暖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1366904_comment'></div>寄绝国而何仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1366904_comment'></div>若浮云而无依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1366904_comment'></div>南徙莫从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1366904_comment'></div>北游失路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1366904_comment'></div>远客汝海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1366904_comment'></div>近还郧城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1366904_comment'></div>昨遇故人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1366904_comment'></div>饮以狂药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1366904_comment'></div>一酌一笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1366904_comment'></div>陶然乐酣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1366904_comment'></div>困河朔之清觞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1366904_comment'></div>饫中山之醇酎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1366904_comment'></div>属早日初眩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1366904_comment'></div>晨霾未收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1366904_comment'></div>乏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1366904", 1366904, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>离朱</span>之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1366904_comment'></div>昧王戎之视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1366904_comment'></div>青白其眼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1366904_comment'></div>瞢而前行。<div id='poem_sentence_79_1366904_comment'></div>昼愧于影。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1366904_comment'></div>夜惭于魄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1366904_comment'></div>启处不遑。<div /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=730&endYear=730')">730年</a>　在安陆，有文。作品：《秋夜于安府送孟赞府兄还都序》<div id='poem_1366918' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366918' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366918?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秋夜于安府送孟赞府兄还都序</a><span class='authorDate'>（730年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366918'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366918'>夫士有饰危冠。佩长剑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366918_comment'></div>扬眉吐诺。激昂青云者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366918_comment'></div>莫不誇炫意气。托交王侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366918_comment'></div>若告之急难。乃十失八九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366918_comment'></div>我义兄孟子。则不然耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366918_comment'></div>道合而襟期暗亲。志乖而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1366918", 1366918, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>肝胆楚越</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366918_comment'></div>鸿骞凤立。不循常流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366918_comment'></div>孔明披书。每观于大略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366918_comment'></div>少君读易。时作于小文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366918_comment'></div>四方贤豪。眩然景慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366918_comment'></div>虽长不满七尺。而心雄万夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366918_comment'></div>至于酒情中酣。天机俊发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366918_comment'></div>则谈笑满席。风云动天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366918_comment'></div>非嵩邱腾精。何以及此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366918_comment'></div>白以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1366918", 1366918, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>弱植</span>。早饮香名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366918_comment'></div>况亲承光辉。恩甚华萼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366918_comment'></div>他乡此别。谁无恨耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366918_comment'></div>时林风吹霜。散下秋草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366918_comment'></div>海雁嘶月。孤鹤翔云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366918_comment'></div>惊魂动骨。戛瑟落涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366918_comment'></div>抗手<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1366918", 1366918, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>缅迈</span>。伤如之何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366918_comment'></div>且各赋诗。以宠行路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366918_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1366918_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=730&endYear=730')">730年春</a>　在安陆，有文上安州裴长史。作品：《上安州裴长史书》<div id='poem_1366907' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366907' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366907?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上安州裴长史书</a><span class='authorDate'>（730年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366907")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366907_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366907'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366907'>白闻天不言而四时行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366907_comment'></div>地不语而百物生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366907_comment'></div>白人焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366907_comment'></div>非天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366907_comment'></div>安得不言而知乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366907_comment'></div>敢剖心析肝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366907_comment'></div>论举身之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366907_comment'></div>便当谈笑以明其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366907_comment'></div>而粗陈其大纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366907_comment'></div>一快愤懑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366907_comment'></div>惟君侯察焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366907_comment'></div>白本家金陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366907_comment'></div>世为右姓<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366907_comment'></div>遭沮渠蒙逊之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366907_comment'></div>奔流咸秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366907_comment'></div>因官寓家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366907_comment'></div>少长江汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366907_comment'></div>五岁诵六甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366907_comment'></div>十岁观百家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366907_comment'></div>轩辕以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366907_comment'></div>颇得闻矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366907_comment'></div>常<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1366907", 1366907, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>横经</span>籍诗书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366907_comment'></div>制作不倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366907_comment'></div>迄于今三十春矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1366907_comment'></div>以为士生则桑弧蓬矢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1366907_comment'></div>射乎四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1366907_comment'></div>故知大丈夫必有四方之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1366907_comment'></div>乃仗剑去国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1366907_comment'></div>辞亲远游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1366907_comment'></div>南穷苍梧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1366907_comment'></div>东涉溟海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1366907_comment'></div>见乡人相如大誇云梦之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1366907_comment'></div>云楚有七泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1366907_comment'></div>遂来观焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1366907_comment'></div>而许相公家见招。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1366907_comment'></div>妻以孙女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1366907_comment'></div>便憩迹于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1366907_comment'></div>至移三霜焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1366907_comment'></div>曩昔东游维扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1366907_comment'></div>不逾一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1366907_comment'></div>散金三十馀万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1366907_comment'></div>有落魄公子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1366907_comment'></div>悉皆济之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1366907_comment'></div>此则是白之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1366907", 1366907, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>轻财好施</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1366907_comment'></div>又昔与蜀中友人吴指南同游于楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1366907_comment'></div>指南死于洞庭之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1366907_comment'></div>白禫服恸哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1366907_comment'></div>若丧天伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1366907_comment'></div>炎月伏尸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1366907_comment'></div>泣尽而继之以血。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1366907_comment'></div>行路闻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1366907_comment'></div>悉皆伤心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1366907_comment'></div>猛虎前临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1366907_comment'></div>坚守不动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1366907_comment'></div>遂权殡于湖侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1366907_comment'></div>便之金陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1366907_comment'></div>数年来观筋骨尚在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1366907_comment'></div>白雪泣持刃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1366907_comment'></div>躬申洗削。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1366907_comment'></div>裹骨徒步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1366907_comment'></div>负之而趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1366907_comment'></div>寝兴携持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1366907_comment'></div>无辍身手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1366907_comment'></div>遂丐贷营葬于鄂城之东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1366907_comment'></div>故乡路遥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1366907_comment'></div>魂魄无主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1366907_comment'></div>礼以迁窆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1366907_comment'></div>式昭朋情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1366907_comment'></div>此则是白存交重义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1366907_comment'></div>又昔与逸人东岩子隐于岷山之阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1366907_comment'></div>白巢居数年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1366907_comment'></div>不迹城市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1366907_comment'></div>养奇禽千计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1366907_comment'></div>呼皆就掌取食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1366907_comment'></div>了无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_74_1366907", 1366907, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>惊猜</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1366907_comment'></div>广汉太守闻而异之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1366907_comment'></div>诣庐亲睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1366907_comment'></div>因举二人以有道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1366907_comment'></div>并不起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1366907_comment'></div>此则白养高忘机不屈之迹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1366907_comment'></div>又前礼部尚书苏公出为益州长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1366907_comment'></div>白于路中投刺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1366907_comment'></div>待以布衣之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1366907_comment'></div>因谓群寮曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1366907_comment'></div>此子天才英丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1366907_comment'></div>下笔不休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1366907_comment'></div>虽风力未成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1366907_comment'></div>且见专车之骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1366907_comment'></div>若广之以学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1366907_comment'></div>可以相如比肩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1366907_comment'></div>四海明识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1366907_comment'></div>且知此谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1366907_comment'></div>前此郡都督马公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1366907_comment'></div>朝野豪彦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1366907_comment'></div>一见尽礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1366907_comment'></div>许为奇才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1366907_comment'></div>因谓长史李京之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1366907_comment'></div>诸人之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1366907_comment'></div>犹山无烟霞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1366907_comment'></div>春无草树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1366907_comment'></div>李白之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1366907_comment'></div>清雄奔放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1366907_comment'></div>名章俊语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1366907_comment'></div>络绎间起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1366907_comment'></div>光明洞彻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1366907_comment'></div>句句动人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1366907_comment'></div>此则故交元丹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1366907_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_107_1366907", 1366907, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>亲接</span>斯议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1366907_comment'></div>若苏马二公愚人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1366907_comment'></div>复何足陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1366907_comment'></div>倘贤者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1366907_comment'></div>白有可尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1366907_comment'></div>夫唐虞之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1366907_comment'></div>于斯为盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1366907_comment'></div>有妇人焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1366907_comment'></div>九人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1366907_comment'></div>是知才难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1366907_comment'></div>不可多得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1366907_comment'></div>白野人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1366907_comment'></div>颇工于文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1366907_comment'></div>惟君侯顾之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1366907_comment'></div>无按剑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1366907_comment'></div>伏惟君侯贵而且贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1366907_comment'></div>鹰扬虎视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1366907_comment'></div>齿若编贝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1366907_comment'></div>肤如凝脂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1366907_comment'></div>昭昭乎若玉山上行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1366907_comment'></div>朗然映人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1366907_comment'></div>而高义重诺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1366907_comment'></div>名飞天京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1366907_comment'></div>四方诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1366907_comment'></div>闻风暗许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1366907_comment'></div>倚剑慷慨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1366907_comment'></div>气干虹蜺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1366907_comment'></div>月费千金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1366907_comment'></div>日宴群客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1366907_comment'></div>出跃骏马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1366907_comment'></div>入罗红颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1366907_comment'></div>所在之处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1366907_comment'></div>宾朋成市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1366907_comment'></div>故诗人歌曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1366907_comment'></div>宾朋何喧喧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1366907_comment'></div>日夜裴公门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1366907_comment'></div>愿得裴公之一言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1366907_comment'></div>不须驱马埒华轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1366907_comment'></div>白不知君侯何以得此声于天壤之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1366907_comment'></div>岂不由重诺好贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1366907_comment'></div>谦以下士得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1366907_comment'></div>而晚节改操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1366907_comment'></div>栖情翰林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1366907_comment'></div>天才超然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1366907_comment'></div>度越作者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1366907_comment'></div>屈佐郧国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1366907_comment'></div>时惟清哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1366907_comment'></div>棱威雄雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1366907_comment'></div>下慑群物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1366907_comment'></div>白窃慕高义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1366907_comment'></div>已经十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1366907_comment'></div>云山间之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1366907_comment'></div>造谒无路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1366907_comment'></div>今也运会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1366907_comment'></div>得趋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_161_1366907", 1366907, "Clauses/161/Comments/0")'>末尘</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1366907_comment'></div>承颜接辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1366907_comment'></div>八九度矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1366907_comment'></div>常欲一雪心迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1366907_comment'></div>崎岖未便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1366907_comment'></div>何图谤詈忽生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1366907_comment'></div>众口攒毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1366907_comment'></div>将欲投杼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1366907_comment'></div>下客震于严威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1366907_comment'></div>然自明无辜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1366907_comment'></div>何忧悔吝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1366907_comment'></div>孔子曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1366907_comment'></div>畏天命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1366907_comment'></div>畏大人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1366907_comment'></div>畏圣人之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1366907_comment'></div>过此三者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1366907_comment'></div>鬼神不害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1366907_comment'></div>若使事得其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1366907_comment'></div>罪当其身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1366907_comment'></div>则将浴兰沐芳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1366907_comment'></div>自屏于烹鲜之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1366907_comment'></div>惟君侯死生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1366907_comment'></div>不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1366907_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_184_1366907", 1366907, "Clauses/184/Comments/0")'>投山窜海</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1366907_comment'></div>转死沟壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1366907_comment'></div>岂能明目张胆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1366907_comment'></div>托书自陈耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1366907_comment'></div>昔王东海问犯夜者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1366907_comment'></div>何所从来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1366907_comment'></div>答曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1366907_comment'></div>从师受学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1366907_comment'></div>不觉日晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1366907_comment'></div>王曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1366907_comment'></div>岂可鞭挞宁越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1366907_comment'></div>以立威名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1366907_comment'></div>想君侯通人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1366907_comment'></div>必不尔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1366907_comment'></div>愿君侯惠以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_198_1366907", 1366907, "Clauses/198/Comments/0")'>大遇</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1366907_comment'></div>洞开心颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1366907_comment'></div>终乎前恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1366907_comment'></div>再辱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_201_1366907", 1366907, "Clauses/201/Comments/0")'>英盼</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1366907_comment'></div>白必能使精诚动天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1366907_comment'></div>长虹贯日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1366907_comment'></div>直度易水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1366907_comment'></div>不以为寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1366907_comment'></div>若赫然作威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1366907_comment'></div>加以大怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1366907_comment'></div>不许门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1366907_comment'></div>逐之长途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1366907_comment'></div>白即膝行于前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1366907_comment'></div>再拜而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1366907_comment'></div>西入<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_212_1366907", 1366907, "Clauses/212/Comments/0")'>秦海</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1366907_comment'></div>一观国风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1366907_comment'></div>永辞君侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1366907_comment'></div>黄鹄举矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1366907_comment'></div>何王公大人之门不可以弹长剑乎。</div><div id='poem_sentence_216_1366907_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1366907'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_1366907_0'>⑴ 谨按此二句不可解旧唐书云白山东人父为任城尉因家焉新书云白兴圣皇帝九世孙隋末以罪徙西域神龙中逃还客巴西窃思白既为兴圣九世孙世为西州右姓如自溯其族望则金陵或系金城之讹否则定因前凉张氏侨置建康郡于敦煌人遂目此建康为金陵故下句云遭沮渠蒙逊之难奔流咸秦按崔鸿十六国春秋云沮渠蒙逊杀吕光酒泉太守叠滕共推建康太守段业为凉州牧应即此事若云江左金陵则白虽因崔宗之官金陵曾经游此并非世居且与下句遭沮渠蒙逊之难云云俱不可通矣</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1366907_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=730&endYear=730')">730年</a>　此前曾多次谒见裴长史，因遭人谗谤，故上书自白。但为裴所拒，遂有入长安之念。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=730&endYear=730')">730年</a>　初夏，往长安。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='b8c7ebe2f50343ed93d9a29358fbd40f_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=732&endYear=732')">732年</a>　还至安陆。冬，元演随来。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='403c1b4c3d4f47d39c624f15b1676e30_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=733&endYear=733')">733年</a>　居安陆白兆山桃花岩。构石室，开山田，日以读书、赋诗、弹琴、饮酒为事，一似绝意仕进者。<br /><a href="javascript: class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366920' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366920?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送戴十五归衡岳序</a><span class='authorDate'>（733年）</span><span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366920_comment'></div>下察交道。海内豪俊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366920_comment'></div>相识如浮云。自谓德参夷颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366920_comment'></div>才亚孔墨。莫不名由口进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366920_comment'></div>实从事退。而风义可合者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366920_comment'></div>厥惟戴侯。戴侯居长沙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366920_comment'></div>禀湖岳之气。少长<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1366920", 1366920, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>咸洛</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366920_comment'></div>窥霸王之图。精微可以入神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366920_comment'></div>懿重可以崇德。谟猷可以尊主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366920_comment'></div>文藻可以成化。兼以五才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366920_comment'></div>统以四美。何往而不济也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366920_comment'></div>其二三诸昆。皆以才秀擢用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366920_comment'></div>辞翰炳发。升闻天朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366920_comment'></div>而此君独潜光后世。以期大用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366920_comment'></div>鲲海未跃。鹏霄悠然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366920_comment'></div>不远千里。访余以道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366920_comment'></div>郧国之秀。有廖侯焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366920_comment'></div>人伦精鉴。天下独立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366920_comment'></div>每延以宴谑。许为通人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366920_comment'></div>独孤有邻及嶭公咸亦以为信然矣。属明主未梦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366920_comment'></div>且归衡阳。憩祝融之云峰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366920_comment'></div>弄茱萸之湍水。轩骑纠合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366920_comment'></div>祖于魏公之林亭。笙歌鸣秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366920_comment'></div>剑舞增气。况江叶坠绿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1366920_comment'></div>沙鸿冥飞。登高送远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1366920_comment'></div>使人心醉。见周张二子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1366920_comment'></div>为论平生鸡黍之期。当速赴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1366920_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1366920_comment'></div></div></div><br id='poem_title_26204_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_26204'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_26204'>春草如有意，罗生玉堂阴。<div id='poem_sentence_0_26204_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_26204'>东风吹愁来，白发坐相侵。<div id='poem_sentence_1_26204_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_26204'>独酌劝孤影，闲歌面芳林。<div id='poem_sentence_2_26204_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_26204'>长松尔何知<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作本无情）</span>，萧瑟为谁吟。<div id='poem_sentence_3_26204_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_26204'>手舞石上月，膝横花间琴。<div id='poem_sentence_4_26204_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_26204'>过此一壶外，悠悠非我心<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_26204_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_26204'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_26204_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_26204'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_26204_0'>⑴ 一本云“春草遍绿野，新莺有佳音。落日不尽欢，恐为愁所侵。独酌劝孤影，闲歌面芳林。清风寻空来，岩松与共吟。手舞石上月，膝横花下琴。过此一壶外，悠悠非我心。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_26204_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_26257' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_26257' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/26257?labeling=true' -----title
武汉（江夏）
-----detail

0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>早春，游江夏，作文送别友人。作品：《早春于江夏送蔡十还家云梦序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（吕华明主张此文作于开元十五年，见《李太白年谱补正》第136页。）</span><div id='poem_1366911' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366911' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366911?labeling=true' target='_blank'>早春于江夏送蔡十还家云梦序</a><span class='authorDate'>（728年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366911")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366911_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366911'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366911'>吾观蔡侯。奇人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366911_comment'></div>尔其才高气远。有四方之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366911_comment'></div>不然。何周流宇宙太多耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366911_comment'></div>白遐穷冥搜。亦已早矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366911_comment'></div>海草三绿。不归国门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366911_comment'></div>又更逢春。再结乡思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366911_comment'></div>一见夫子。冥心道存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366911_comment'></div>穷朝晚以作宴。驱烟霞以辅赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366911_comment'></div>朗笑明月。时眠落花。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366911_comment'></div>斯游无何。寻告暌索。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366911_comment'></div>来暂观我。去还愁人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366911_comment'></div>乃浮汉阳。入云梦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366911_comment'></div>乡枻云叩。归魂亦飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366911_comment'></div>且青山绿枫。累道相接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366911_comment'></div>遇胜因赏。利君前行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366911_comment'></div>既非远离。曷足多叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366911_comment'></div>秋七月。结游镜湖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366911_comment'></div>无愆我期。先子而往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366911_comment'></div>敬慎好去。终当早来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366911_comment'></div>无使耶川白云。不得复弄尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366911_comment'></div>乡中廖公及诸才子。为诗略谢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366911_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1366911_comment'></div></div></div><br id='poem_sentence_1_1366913_comment'></div>极目四海。手弄白日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366913_comment'></div>顶摩<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1366913", 1366913, id='poem_sentence_3_1366913_comment'></div>不可得也。而金骨未变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366913_comment'></div>玉颜已缁。何常不扪松伤心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366913_comment'></div>抚鹤叹息。误学书剑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366913_comment'></div>薄游人间。紫禁九重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366913_comment'></div>碧山万里。有才无命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366913_comment'></div>甘于后时。刘表不用于祢衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366913_comment'></div>暂来江夏。贺循喜逢于张翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366913_comment'></div>且乐船中。遇达人张侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366913_comment'></div>连兴数月。醉尽花柳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366913_comment'></div>赏穷江山。王命有程。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366913_comment'></div>告以于迈。烟景晚色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366913_comment'></div>惨为愁容。系飞帆于半天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366913_comment'></div>泛渌水于遥海。欲去不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366913_comment'></div>更开芳樽。乐虽寰中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366913_comment'></div>趣逸天外。平生酣畅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366913_comment'></div>未若此时。至于清谈浩歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366913_comment'></div>雄笔丽藻。笑饮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1366913", 1366913, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>醁酒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366913_comment'></div>醉挥素琴。余实不愧于古人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1366913_comment'></div>扬袂远别。何时归来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1366913_comment'></div>想洛阳之秋风。将鲙鱼以相待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1366913_comment'></div>诗可赠远。无乃阙乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_title_26072_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_26072'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_26072'>忆昔<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_26072", 26072, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>娇小</span>姿，春心亦自持。<div id='poem_sentence_0_26072_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_26072'>为言嫁夫婿，得免长相思。<div id='poem_sentence_1_26072_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_26072'>谁知嫁商贾，令人却愁苦。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1366927_comment'></div>白月在天。朗然独出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366927_comment'></div>既洒落于彩翰。亦讽诵于人口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366927_comment'></div>百千开士。稀有此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366927_comment'></div>余所以叹其峻节。扬其清波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366927_comment'></div>龙象先辈。回眸拭视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366927_comment'></div>比夫汨泥沙者。相去如牛之一毛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366927_comment'></div>昔智者安禅于台山。远公托志于庐岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366927_comment'></div>高标胜槩。斯亦向慕哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366927_comment'></div>紫霞摇心。青枫夹岸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366927_comment'></div>目断川上。送君此行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366927_comment'></div>群公临流。赋诗以赠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366927_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1366927_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=734&endYear=734')">734年</a>　在江夏，有诗赠友人。作品：《江夏别宋之悌》<div id='poem_25711' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_25711' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_25711'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_25711'>楚水清若空，遥将碧海通。<div id='poem_sentence_0_25711_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366930_comment'></div>气高时英。辩折天口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366930_comment'></div>道可济物。志栖无垠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366930_comment'></div>鄱阳张公。朝野荣望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366930_comment'></div>爱客接士。即原尝春陵之亚焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366930_comment'></div>每钦其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1366930", 1366930, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>辞华</span>。悬榻见往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366930_comment'></div>而黄公因访古迹。便从贵游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366930_comment'></div>乃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1366930", 1366930, class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366930_comment'></div>天南回以变夏。火西飞而献秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366930_comment'></div>汀葭飒然。海草微落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366930_comment'></div>夫子行迈。我心若何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366930_comment'></div>毋金玉尔音。而有遐心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366930_comment'></div>湖水演沔。勖哉是行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366930_comment'></div>共赋武昌钓台篇。以慰别情耳。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=757&endYear=757')">757年</a>　在宋若思幕，有文。作品：《武昌宰韩君去思颂碑（并序）》<div id='poem_1366950' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366950' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366950?labeling=true' target='_blank'>武昌宰韩君去思颂碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（757年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366950")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366950_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366950'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366950'>仲尼大圣人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366950_comment'></div>宰中都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366950_comment'></div>而四方取则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366950_comment'></div>子贱大贤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366950_comment'></div>宰单父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366950_comment'></div>人到于今而思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366950_comment'></div>乃知德之休明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366950_comment'></div>不在位之高下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366950_comment'></div>其或继之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366950_comment'></div>得非韩君乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366950_comment'></div>君名仲卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366950_comment'></div>南阳人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366950_comment'></div>昔延陵知晋国之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366950_comment'></div>必分于韩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366950_comment'></div>献子虽不能遏屠岸之诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366950_comment'></div>存孤嗣赵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366950_comment'></div>太史公称天下阴德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366950_comment'></div>其贤才罗生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366950_comment'></div>列侯十世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366950_comment'></div>不亦宜哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366950_comment'></div>七代祖茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366950_comment'></div>后魏尚书令安定王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366950_comment'></div>五代祖钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366950_comment'></div>金部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1366950_comment'></div>曾祖晙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1366950_comment'></div>银青光禄大夫雅州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1366950_comment'></div>祖泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1366950_comment'></div>曹州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1366950_comment'></div>考睿素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1366950_comment'></div>朝散大夫桂州都督府长史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1366950_comment'></div>分茅纳言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1366950_comment'></div>剖符佐郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1366950_comment'></div>奕叶明德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1366950_comment'></div>休有烈光。<div id='poem_sentence_87_1366950_comment'></div>多所宏益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1366950_comment'></div>尚书右丞崔公禹称之于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_26120' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_26120' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/26120?labeling=true' target='_blank'>泛沔州城南郎官湖</a><span class='authorDate'>（758年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_26120")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_26120_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_26120'>乾元岁，秋八月，白迁于夜郎，遇故人尚书郎张谓出使夏口，沔州牧杜公、汉阳宰王公，觞于江城之南湖，乐天下之再平也。方夜，水月如练，清光可掇。张公殊有胜概，四望超然，乃顾白曰：「此湖古来贤豪游者非一，而枉践佳景，寂寥无闻。夫子可为我标之嘉名，以传不朽。」白因举酒酹水，号之曰郎官湖，亦犹郑圃之有仆射陂也。席上文士辅翼岑静，以为知言，乃命赋诗纪事，刻石湖侧，将与大别山共相磨灭焉。</div><div id='poem_preface_26120_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_26120'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_26120'>张公多逸兴，共泛沔城隅。<div id='poem_sentence_0_26120_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_26120'>当时秋月好，不减武昌都。<div id='poem_sentence_1_26120_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' "poem_sentence_0_26448")'>鲍明远</span>，邀彼休上人。<div id='poem_sentence_0_26448_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_26448'>鼓琴乱<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_2_26448_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_26448'>相思两不见，流泪空盈巾。<div id='poem_sentence_3_26448_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_26448'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_26448_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=759&endYear=759')">759年秋</a>　在江夏，有文。作品：《天长节使鄂州刺史韦公德政碑（并序）》<div id='poem_1366949' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366949' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366949?labeling=true' target='_blank'>天长节度使鄂州刺史韦公德政碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（759年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366949")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366949_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1366949'>太虚既张。惟天之长。所以白帝真人。当高秋八月五日。降西方之金精。采天长为名将。传之无穷。纪圣诞之节也。我高祖创业。太宗成之。三后继统。王猷如一。大盗閒起。开元中兴。力倍造化。功包天地。不然。何能遏牺农之颓波。返淳朴于太古。虽轩后至道。由闻蚩尤之师。今网漏吞舟。而胡夷起于毂下。先天文武孝感皇帝越在明两。总戎扶风。正帝车于北斗。拯横流于鲸口。回日辔于西山。拂蒙尘于帝颜。呼吸而收两京。烜赫而安六合。历列辟而罕匹。顾将来而无俦。太阳重轮。合耀并出。宇宙翕变。草木增荣。一麾而静妖氛。成功不处。五让而传剑玺。德冠乐推。于戏。昔尧及舜禹。皆无圣子。审历数去已。终大宝假人。饰让以成千载之美。未若以文明鸿业。授之元良。与天同休。相统亿祀。则我唐至公而无私。越三圣而殊轨。腾万人之喜气。烂八极之祥云。上皇思汾阳而高蹈。解负重于吾君。能事斯毕。与人更始。乃展祀郊庙。望秩山川。方掩骼于河洛。吊人于幽燕。但诛元凶。不问小罪。噫大块之气。歌炎汉之风。云滂洋。雨汪濊。澡渥泽。除瑕颣。削平国步。改号乾元。至矣哉。其雄图景命。有如此者。我邦伯韦公。大彭之洪允。扶阳之贵族。雄略迈古。高文变风。运当时贤。才堪三事。历职剖剧。能声旁流。衣绣而白笔横冠。分符而彤䄡入境。曩者永王以天人授钺。东巡无名。利剑承喉以胁从。壮心坚守而不动。房陵之俗。安于泰山。休奕列郡。去若始至。帝召岐下。深嘉直诚。移镇夏口。救时艰也。慎厥职。康乃人。减兵归农。除害息暴。大水灭郭。洪霖注川。人见忧于鱼鳖。岸不辨于牛马。公乃抗辞正色。言于城隍曰。若一日雨不歇。吾当伐乔木。焚清祠。精心感动。其应如响。无何。中使衔命。遍祈名山。广徵牲牢。骤欲致祭。公又盱衡而称曰。今皇上明圣。怀于百灵。此淫昏之鬼。不载祀典。若烦国礼。是荒巫风。其秉心达诚。皆此类也。物不知化。如登春台。有若江夏县令嶭公。揖四豪之风。当百里之寄。干蛊有立。含章可贞。遵之典礼。恤疲于和乐。政其成也。臻于小康。中京重睹于汉仪。列郡还闻于舜乐。选鄂之胜。帐于东门。乃登豳歌。击土鼓。祀蓐收。迎田祖。招摇回而大火乃落。阊阖启而凉风始归。笙竽和籥之音。象星辰而迭奏。吴楚巴渝之曲。各土风而备陈。礼容有穆。簪笏列序。罗衣蛾眉。立乎玳筵之上。班剑虎士。森乎翠幕之前。千变百戏。分曹贾勇。蔺子跳剑。迭跃流星之辉。都卢寻橦。倒挂浮云之影。百川绕郡。落天镜于江城。四山入牖。照山空之海色。献觞醉于晚景。舞袖纷于广庭。鹤发之叟。雁序而进曰。恭闻天子无戏言。恐转公以大用。老父不畏死。愿留公以上闻。悦坐棠而餐风。庶刻石以寘美。白观乐入楚。闻韶在齐。采诸行谣。遂作颂曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1366949_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366949'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366949'>爽朗太白。雄光下射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366949_comment'></div>峥嵘金天。华岳旁连。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366949_comment'></div>降精腾气。赫矣昭然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366949_comment'></div>诞圣五日。垂休万年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366949_comment'></div>孽胡挺灾。大人有作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366949_comment'></div>雷电发扬。欃枪乃落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366949_comment'></div>九服交泰。五云萦薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366949_comment'></div>扫雪屯蒙。洗清寥廓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366949_comment'></div>轩后访道。来登峨眉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366949_comment'></div>上皇西去。异代同时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366949_comment'></div>六龙转驾。两曜回规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366949_comment'></div>重遭唐主。更睹汉仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366949_comment'></div>肃肃韦公。大邦之翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366949_comment'></div>秀骨岳立。英谋电断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366949_comment'></div>宣风树声。远威逆乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366949_comment'></div>不长不极。乐奏争观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366949_comment'></div>丸剑挥霍。鱼龙屈盘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366949_comment'></div>东回舞袖。西笑长安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366949_comment'></div>颂声载路。丰碑是刊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366949_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1366949_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_4_25785_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_25882' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_25882' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/25882?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与诸公送陈郎将归衡阳</a><span class='authorDate'>（760年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_25882")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_25882_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_25882'>仲尼旅人，文王明夷，苟非其时，圣贤低眉。况仆之不肖者，而迁逐枯槁，固非其宜。朝心不开，暮发尽白，而登高送远，使人增愁。陈郎将义风凛然，英思逸发。来下曹城之榻，去邀才子之诗。动清兴于中流，泛素波而径去。诸公仰望不及，连章祖之。序惭起予，辄冠名贤之首。作者嗤我，乃为抚掌之资乎。</div><div id='poem_preface_25882_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_25882'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(6320, 南阳

-----title
西安（长安）
-----detail

class='authorDate'>（743年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_25740")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_25740_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_25740_0'>① 奉诏作。明皇坐沈香亭，意有所感，欲得白为乐章。召入，而白已醉，左右以水颒面，稍解。援笔成文，宛丽精切。</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_25740'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4254, "poem_allusion_25740")'>金屋</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_25740_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_25740'><div class='poemSentence' "poem_sentence_0_25740")'>金屋</span>，盈盈在<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_25740", 25740, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>紫微</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_25740_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_25740'>山花插宝髻，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_25740", 25740, class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_25566' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/25566?labeling=true' target='_blank'>杂曲歌辞<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>清平调<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（743年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_25566")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_25566_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_25566_0'>① 唐《礼乐志》曰：“清调、平调，房中乐遗声。开元中，禁中重木芍药，会花方繁开，帝乘照夜白，太真妃以步辇从，李龟年以歌擅一时之名。帝曰：‘赏名花，对妃子，焉用旧乐辞为？’遂命白作《清平调》词三章，令梨园弟子略抚丝竹以促歌，帝自调玉笛以倚曲。”</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_25566'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_25566'>云想衣裳花想容，春风拂槛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_25566", 25566, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>露华</span>浓。<div id='poem_sentence_0_25566_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_25566'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_25566", 25566, id='poem_title_25568_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_25568_0'>① 唐《礼乐志》曰：“清调、平调，房中乐遗声。开元中，禁中重木芍药，会花方繁开，帝乘照夜白，太真妃以步辇从，李龟年以歌擅一时之名。帝曰：‘赏名花，对妃子，焉用旧乐辞为？’遂命白作《清平调》词三章，令梨园弟子略抚丝竹以促歌，帝自调玉笛以倚曲。”</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_25568'><div id='poem_sentence_2_25968'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_25968", 25968, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>荣华</span>东流水，万事皆波澜。<div id='poem_sentence_2_25968_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_25968'>白日掩<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_25968", 25968, id='poem_note_25968'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_25968_1'>⑴ 一作“登高望四海，天地何漫漫。霜被群物秋，风飘大荒寒。杀气落乔木，浮云蔽层峦。孤凤鸣天倪，遗声何辛酸。游人悲旧国，抚心亦盘桓。倚剑歌所思，曲终涕泗澜。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_26000_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_26000'>相如作赋得黄金，丈夫好新多异心。<div id='poem_sentence_5_26000_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_26000'>一朝将聘茂陵女，文君因赠<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作赋）</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(334, "poem_sentence_6_26000")'>白头吟</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_26000_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_26000'>东流不作西归水，落花辞条归故林。<div id='poem_sentence_7_26000_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_26000'>谁使女萝枝，而来强萦抱。<div id='poem_sentence_9_26000_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_26000'>两草犹一心，人心不如草。<div id='poem_sentence_10_26000_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_26000'>莫卷龙须席，从他生网丝。<div id='poem_sentence_11_26000_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_26000'>且留琥珀枕，或有梦来时。<div id='poem_sentence_12_26000_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_26000'>覆水再收岂满杯，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_26000", 26000, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>弃妾</span>已去难重回。<div id='poem_sentence_13_26000_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_26000'>古来得意不相负，祇今惟见<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(7029, "poem_sentence_14_26000")'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_26000", 26000, "Clauses/29/Comments/2")'>青陵台</span></span><sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_26000_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_26000'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_26000_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_26000'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_14_26000_0'>⑴ 一作“锦水东流碧，波荡双鸳鸯。雄巢汉宫树，雌弄秦草芳。相如去蜀谒武帝，赤车驷马生辉光。一朝再览大人作，万乘忽欲凌云翔。闻道阿娇失恩宠，千金买赋要君王。相如不忆贫贱日，位高金多聘私室。茂陵姝子皆见求，文君欢爱从此毕。泪如双泉水，行堕紫罗襟。五更鸡三唱，清晨白头吟。长吁不整绿云鬓，仰诉青天哀怨深。城崩杞梁妻，谁道土无心。东流不作西归水，落花辞枝羞故林。头上玉燕钗，是妾嫁时物。赠君表相思，罗袖幸时拂。莫捲龙须席，从他生网丝。且留琥珀枕，还有梦来时。鹔鹴裘在锦屏上，自君一挂无由披。妾有秦楼镜，照心胜照井。愿持照新人，双对可怜影。覆水却收不满杯，相如还谢文君回。古来得意不相负，只今惟有青陵台”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_26000_comment'></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_26000'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(26000)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=743&endYear=743')">743年</a>　在长安，有文。作品：《汉东紫阳先生碑铭》《金银泥画西方净土变相赞》<div id='poem_1366952' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366952' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366952?labeling=true' target='_blank'>唐汉东紫阳先生碑铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（743年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366952")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366952_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366952'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366952'>呜呼紫阳。竟夭其志以默化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366952_comment'></div>不昭然白日而升九天乎。或将潜宾皇王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366952_comment'></div>非世所测<span class='inlineComment2'>（阙十一字）</span>。挺列仙明拔之英姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366952_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1366952", 1366952, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>明堂</span>平白。长耳广颡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366952_comment'></div>挥手振骨。百关有声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366952_comment'></div>殊毛秀采。居然逸异<span class='inlineComment2'>（阙十字）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366952_comment'></div>而且达河龟鹤早世而蟪蛄延秋。元命乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366952_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1366952", 1366952, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>遭命</span>乎。余长息三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366952_comment'></div>懵于变化之理。先生姓胡氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366952_comment'></div>□□□□□□族也。代业黄老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366952_comment'></div>门清儒素。皆龙脱世纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366952_comment'></div>鸿冥高云。但贵天爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366952_comment'></div>何徵阀阅。始八岁经仙城山<span class='inlineComment2'>（阙十一字）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366952_comment'></div>有清都紫微之遐想。九岁出家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366952_comment'></div>十二休粮。二十游衡山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366952_comment'></div>云寻洞府。水涉溟壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366952_comment'></div>神王<span class='inlineComment2'>（阙八字）</span>召为威仪及天下采经使。因遇诸真人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366952_comment'></div>授赤丹阳精石景水母。故常吸飞根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366952_comment'></div>吞日魂。密而修之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366952_comment'></div>□□□□□□所居苦竹院。置餐霞之楼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366952_comment'></div>手植双桂。栖迟其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366952_comment'></div>闻金陵之墟。道始盛于三茅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366952_comment'></div>波乎四许华阳<span class='inlineComment2'>（阙七字）</span>陶隐居传升元子。升元子传体元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366952_comment'></div>体元传贞一先生。贞一先生传天师李含光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1366952_comment'></div>李含光合契乎紫阳。□□□□□于神农之里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1366952_comment'></div>南抵朱陵。北越白水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1366952_comment'></div>禀训门下者三千馀人。邻境牧守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1366952_comment'></div>移风问道。忽遇先生之宴坐□□□□□隐机雁行而前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1366952_comment'></div>为时见重。多此类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1366952_comment'></div>天宝初。威仪元丹邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1366952_comment'></div>道门龙凤。厚礼致屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1366952_comment'></div>传箓于嵩山东京大唐□□宫三请固辞偃卧。未几而诏书下责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1366952_comment'></div>不得已而行。入宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1366952_comment'></div>一革轨仪。大变都邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1366952_comment'></div>然海鸟愁臧文之享。猿狙裂周公之衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1366952_comment'></div>志往迹留。称疾辞帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1366952_comment'></div>尅期离阙。临别自祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1366952_comment'></div>其文曰。神将厌余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1366952_comment'></div>余非厌世。乃顾命侄道士胡齐物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1366952_comment'></div>具平肩舆。归骨旧土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1366952_comment'></div>王公卿士。送及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1366952", 1366952, "Clauses/81/Comments/0")'>龙门</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1366952_comment'></div>入叶县。次王乔之祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1366952_comment'></div>目若有睹。泊然而化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1366952_comment'></div>天香引道。尸轻空衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1366952_comment'></div>及本郡太守裴公以幡华郊迎。举郭雷动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1366952_comment'></div>南□□□开颜如生。观者日万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1366952_comment'></div>群议骇俗。至其年十月二十三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1366952_comment'></div>葬于郭东之新松山。春秋六十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1366952_comment'></div>先生含宏光大。不修小节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1366952_comment'></div>书不尽妙。郁有崩云之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1366952_comment'></div>文非夙工。时动雕龙之作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1366952_comment'></div>存也宇宙而无光。殁也浪化而蝉蜕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1366952_comment'></div>岂<span class='inlineComment2'>（阙八字）</span>乎有乡僧贞倩。雅仗才气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1366952_comment'></div>请余为铭。余与紫阳神交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1366952_comment'></div>饱餐素论。十得其九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1366952_comment'></div>弟子元丹邱王□等。咸傃鸾凤之仪羽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1366952_comment'></div>想珠玉之云气。洒扫松月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1366952_comment'></div>载扬仙风。篆石颂德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1366952_comment'></div>与兹山不朽。其词曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1366952_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_59_1366952'>贤哉仙士。六十而化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1366952_comment'></div>光光紫阳。善与时而为龙蛇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1366952_comment'></div>固亦以生死为昼夜。有力者挈之而趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1366952_comment'></div>劫运颓落。终归于无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1366952_comment'></div>惟元神不灭。湛然清都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1366952_comment'></div>延陵既殁。仲尼呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1366952_comment'></div>青青松柏。离离山隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1366952_comment'></div>篆石颂德。名扬八区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1366952_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_67_1366952_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1366940' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366940' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366940?labeling=true' target='_blank'>金银泥画西方净土变相赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（743年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366940")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366940_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1366940'>我闻金方之西。日没之所。去中华十万亿刹。有极乐世界焉。彼国之佛。身长六十万亿恒沙由旬。眉间白毫向右。宛转如五须弥山。目光清白。若四大海水。端坐说法。湛然常存。沼明金沙。岸列珍树。栏楯弥覆。罗网周张。砗磲琉璃。为楼殿之饰。颇黎码碯。耀阶砌之荣。皆诸佛所證。无虚言者。金银泥画西方净土变柑。盖冯翊郡秦夫人奉为亡夫湖川刺史韦公之所建也。夫人蕴冰玉之清。敷圣善之训。以伉俪大义。希拯拔于幽涂。父子恩深。用薰修于景福。誓舍珍物。购求名工。图金创端。绘银设像。八法功德。波动青莲之池。七宝香花。光映黄金之地。清风所拂。如生五音。百千妙乐。咸疑动作。若已发愿及未发愿。若已当生及未当生。精念七日。必生其国。功德罔极。酌而难名。赞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1366940_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366940'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366940'>向西日没处。遥瞻大悲颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366940_comment'></div>目净碧海水。身光紫金山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366940_comment'></div>勤念必往生。是故称极乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366940_comment'></div>珠网珍宝树。天花散香阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366940_comment'></div>图画了在眼。愿托彼道场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366940_comment'></div>以此功德海。冥祐为舟梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366940_comment'></div>八十一劫罪。如风扫轻霜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366940_comment'></div>庶观无量寿。长放玉毫光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366940_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1366940_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=743&endYear=743')">743年</a>　在长安，有诗。作品：《送羽林陶将军》<div id='poem_26276' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_26276' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_26276'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_26276'>将军出使拥楼船，江上旌旗拂紫烟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_26276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_26276_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=743&endYear=743')">743年</a>　在长安，有文。作品：《羽林范将军画赞》《早夏于将军叔宅与诸昆季送傅八之江南序》<div id='poem_1366941' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366941' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366941?labeling=true' target='_blank'>羽林范将军图赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（743年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366941")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1366941_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366941'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366941'>羽林列卫，壁垒南垣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1366941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1366941'>四十五星，光辉至尊。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1366941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1366941'>范公拜将，遥承主恩。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1366941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1366941'>位宠虎臣，封传雁门。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1366941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1366941'>瞻天蹈舞，踊跃精魂。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1366941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1366941'>逐逐鹗视，昂昂鸿骞。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1366941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1366941'>心豪祖逖，气爽刘琨。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1366941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1366941'>名震大国，威扬列藩。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1366941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1366941'>麟阁之阶，粉图华轩。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1366941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1366941'>胡兵百万，横行纵吞。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1366941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1366941'>爪牙帝室，功业长存。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1366941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1366941'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1366941_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1366914' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366914' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366914?labeling=true' target='_blank'>早夏于将军叔宅与诸昆季送傅八之江南序</a><span class='authorDate'>（743年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366914")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366914_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366914'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366914'>易曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366914_comment'></div>观乎人文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366914_comment'></div>以化成天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366914_comment'></div>穷此道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366914_comment'></div>其惟傅侯耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366914_comment'></div>侯篇章惊新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366914_comment'></div>海内称善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366914_comment'></div>五言之作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366914_comment'></div>妙绝当时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366914_comment'></div>陶公愧田园之能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366914_comment'></div>谢客惭山水之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366914_comment'></div>佳句籍籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366914_comment'></div>人为美谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366914_comment'></div>前许州司马宋公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366914_comment'></div>蕴冰清之姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366914_comment'></div>重傅侯玉润之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366914_comment'></div>妻以其子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366914_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1366914", 1366914, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>凤凰于飞</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366914_comment'></div>潘杨之好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366914_comment'></div>斯为睦矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366914_comment'></div>仆不佞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366914_comment'></div>忝于芳尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366914_comment'></div>宴同一筵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366914_comment'></div>心契千古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1366914_comment'></div>清酌连晓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1366914_comment'></div>元谈入微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1366914_comment'></div>欢携无何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1366914_comment'></div>旋告暌拆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1366914_comment'></div>将军叔英略盖古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1366914_comment'></div>英明洞神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1366914_comment'></div>天王贵宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1366914_comment'></div>诞育贤子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1366914_comment'></div>八龙增秀以列次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1366914_comment'></div>五色相辉而有文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1366914_comment'></div>会言高乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1366914_comment'></div>晓饯金门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1366914_comment'></div>洗德弦觞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1366914_comment'></div>怡颜朱明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1366914_comment'></div>草木已盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1366914_comment'></div>且江嶂若画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1366914_comment'></div>赏盈前途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1366914_comment'></div>自然屏间坐游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1366914_comment'></div>镜里行到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1366914_comment'></div>霞月千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1366914_comment'></div>足供文章之用哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1366914_comment'></div>征帆空悬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1366914_comment'></div>落日相迫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1366914_comment'></div>二季挥翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1366914_comment'></div>诗其赠焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_48_1366914_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=743&endYear=743')">743年</a>　夏，玄宗泛白莲池，召白作序。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=743&endYear=743')">743年</a>　对御用文人生活日渐厌倦，乃浪迹纵酒，以自昏秽。常与贺知章等人为“酒中八仙”之游。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=743&endYear=743')">743年</a>　尝奉召草制诏书，又在醉中，引足令高力士脱靴。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=743&endYear=743')">743年</a>　因与朝中奸佞之辈不合，遂遭谗谤，玄宗疏之。<br /><a href="javascript: "poem_sentence_5_26043")'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_26043", 26043, "Clauses/11/Comments/1")'>上蔡苍鹰</span></span>何足道？<div id='poem_sentence_5_26043_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_26043'>君不见吴中<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(771, "poem_sentence_6_26043")'>张翰</span>称<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作真）</span>达士<span class='inlineComment2'>（集作生）</span>，秋风忽忆江东行<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑻</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_26043_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_26043'>且乐生前一杯酒，何须身后千载名。<div id='poem_sentence_7_26043_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_26043'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_26043_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_26043'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_26043_0'>⑴ 高士传：「尧之让许由也，由以告巢父，巢父曰：『汝何不藏汝形，藏汝光？若非吾友也。』击其膺而下之。由怅然不自得，乃过清泠之水，洗其耳曰：『向闻贪言，负吾友矣！。』遂去，终身不相见。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_26043_0'>⑵ 史记伯夷列传：「武王已平殷乱，天下宗周，而伯夷、叔齐耻之，义不食周粟，隐于首阳山，采薇而食之。」索隐：「薇，蕨也。」</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_26043_0'>⑶ 无名：老子：「无名之朴，亦将不欲。」</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_26043_0'>⑷ 子胥，伍子胥。春秋楚人。名员，父奢，兄尚，为平王所杀，子胥奔吴，仕行人，佐吴王阖庐伐楚，五战而入楚都郢。时平王已卒，子胥掘墓鞭尸，以报父兄之仇。阖庐伐越，伤指卒，子夫差立，伐越，大破之。越王句践请和，夫差许之，子胥谏不听。其后屡请谋越，亦不纳。太宰嚭得越贿，谗之，夫差赐子胥属镂之剑，曰：「子以此死。」子胥谓其舍人曰：『抉吾眼悬诸吴东门，以观越人之入灭吴也。」乃自刭死，后九年，越果灭吴。○吴越春秋：「吴王闻子胥之怨恨也，乃使人赐属镂之剑，子胥……伏剑而死，吴王乃取子胥尸，盛以鸱夷（革囊也）之器，投之于江中。」国语。吴语：「申胥将死，曰：『而悬吾目于东门，以见越之入也。』王愠曰：『孤不使大夫得有见也。』乃使取申胥之尸，盛以鸱夷而投之于江。」</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_26043_0'>⑸ 屈原：战国楚人，名平，别号灵均，博闻强记，明于治乱，仕楚为三闾大夫。怀王重其才，靳尚辈谮而疏之，原忧愁幽思，而作离骚，冀王感悟。襄王时复用谗，谪原于江南，原作渔父诸篇以见志，寻自沉汨罗而死。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_26043_1'>⑹ 陆机：晋吴郡人，字士衡。服膺儒术，词藻宏丽。祖逊，父抗，世仕吴。吴亡，机闭门勤学，作辩亡论二篇，以述吴之兴亡，及其祖若父之功绩。太康末，与弟云俱入洛，造太常张华。华曰：「伐吴之役，利获二俊。」后事成都王颖，受命讨长沙王乂，拜大将军，授河北大都督。军败被谮，颖使收机，机曰：「华亭鹤唳，可复闻乎？」遂遇害。有陆平原集。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_26043_0'>⑺ 李斯：秦上蔡人。尝从荀卿学。始皇既定天下，斯为丞相，定郡县之制，下禁书令，变籀文为小篆。始皇崩，斯听赵高计，矫诏杀扶苏二世。二世立，赵高用事，与斯互忌，高乃诬斯子由通盗，腰斩咸阳市，夷三族。○太平御览：「史记曰：『李斯临刑，思牵黄犬，臂苍鹰，出上蔡东门，不可得矣。』」考今本史记李斯传中，无臂苍鹰字，而太白诗中屡用其事，当另有所本。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_6_26043_0'>⑻ 张翰：晋书卷九二张翰传：「齐王囧辟为大司马东曹掾，囧时秉权，‥‥‥翰因见秋风起，乃思吴中菰菜莼羹、鲈鱼脍，曰：『人生贵适志，何能羁宦数千里以要名爵乎？』遂命驾而归。...翰任心自适，不求当世，或谓卿乃可纵适一时，独不为身后名邪？』答曰：『使我有身后名，不如即时一杯酒。』时人贵其旷达。」</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_26043_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_26228' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_26228' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/26228?labeling=true' target='_blank'>相和歌辞 id='poem_sentence_0_25910_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_25910'>举杯邀明月，对影成三人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_25910_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_25913_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_25913'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_25913_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_26104' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_26104' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/26104?labeling=true' target='_blank'>把酒问月<span class='inlineComment2'>（故人贾淳令予问之。）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（744年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_26104")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_26104_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_26104'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(477, "poem_allusion_26104")'>嫦娥</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_26104_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_26104'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_26104'>青天有月来几时，我今停杯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_26104", 26104, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>一问</span>之。<div id='poem_sentence_0_26104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_26104'>人攀明月不可得，月行却与人相随。<div id='poem_sentence_1_26104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_26104'>皎如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_26104", 26104, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>飞镜</span>临丹阙，绿烟灭尽清辉发。<div id='poem_sentence_2_26104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_26104'>但见宵从海上来，宁知晓向云间没。<div id='poem_sentence_3_26104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_26104'>白兔捣药秋复春，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(477, "poem_sentence_4_26104")'>嫦娥</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_26104", 26104, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>孤栖</span>与谁邻。<div id='poem_sentence_4_26104_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_26104'>今人不见古时月，今月曾经照古人。<div 此诗一作《感兴》云：“朅来荆山客，谁为珉玉分。良宝绝见弃，虚持三献君。直木忌先伐，芬兰哀自焚。盈满天所损，沈冥道所群。东海有碧水，西山多白云。鲁连及夷齐，可以蹑清芬。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_25965_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_25947' class='_poem'><div -----title
登封（颍阳）
-----detail
