id='poem_sentence_1_26440'>倚松开其缄，忆我肠断续。<div id='poem_sentence_1_26440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_26440'>不以千里遥，命驾来相招。<div id='poem_sentence_2_26440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_26440'>中逢元丹丘，登岭宴碧霄。<div id='poem_sentence_3_26440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_26440'>对酒忽思我，长啸临清飙。<div id='poem_sentence_4_26440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_26440'>蹇予未相知，茫茫绿云垂。<div id='poem_sentence_5_26440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_26440'>俄然素书及，解此长渴饥。<div id='poem_sentence_6_26440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_26440'>策马望山月，途穷造阶墀。<div id='poem_sentence_7_26440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_26440'>喜兹一会面，若睹琼树枝。<div id='poem_sentence_8_26440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_26440'>忆君我远来，我欢方速至。<div id='poem_sentence_9_26440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_26440'>开颜酌美酒，乐极忽成醉。<div id='poem_sentence_10_26440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_26440'>我情既不浅，君意方亦深。<div id='poem_sentence_11_26440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_26440'>相知两相得，一顾轻千金。<div id='poem_sentence_12_26440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 洛阳

class='poemContent' id='poem_content_26341'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_26341'>青楼何所在，乃在碧云中。<div id='poem_sentence_0_26341_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_26049'>流光欺人忽蹉跎。<div id='poem_sentence_3_26049_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_26049'>君起舞，日<span class='link' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366921'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366921'>紫云仙季有英风焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366921_comment'></div>吾家见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366921_comment'></div>若众星之有月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366921_comment'></div>贵则天王之令弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366921_comment'></div>宝则海岳之奇精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366921_comment'></div>游者所谓风生玉林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366921_comment'></div>清明萧洒。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366921_comment'></div>皆锦绣耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366921_comment'></div>不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366921_comment'></div>何开口成文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366921_comment'></div>挥翰雾散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366921_comment'></div>因抚掌大笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366921_comment'></div>扬眉当之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366921_comment'></div>使王澄再闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366921_comment'></div>亦复绝倒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366921_comment'></div>观夫笔走群象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366921_comment'></div>思通神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366921_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1366921", 1366921, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>龙章</span>炳然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366921_comment'></div>可得而见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366921_comment'></div>岁十二月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366921_comment'></div>拜省于淮南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1366921_comment'></div>思白华之长吟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1366921_comment'></div>眺黄云之晚色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1366921_comment'></div>目断心尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1366921_comment'></div>情悬高堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1366921_comment'></div>倾兰醑而送行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1366921_comment'></div>赫金鞍而照地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1366921_comment'></div>错毂蹲野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1366921_comment'></div>朝英满筵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1366921_comment'></div>非才名动时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1366921_comment'></div>何以及此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1366921_comment'></div>日落酒罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1366921_comment'></div>前山阴烟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1366921_comment'></div>殷勤惠言吾道东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1366921_comment'></div>坐想洛桥春色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1366921_comment'></div>先到淮城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1366921_comment'></div>见千条之绿柳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1366921_comment'></div>折一枝以相赠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1366921_comment'></div>则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1366921", 1366921, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>华萼</span>情在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1366921_comment'></div>吾无恨焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1366921_comment'></div>群公赋诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1366921_comment'></div>以光荣饯。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1366921_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在洛阳，有文赠友人。作品：《奉饯十七翁二十四翁寻桃花源序》<div id='poem_1366926' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366926_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366926'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366926'>昔祖龙灭古道。威严刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366926_comment'></div>煎熬生人。若坠大火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366926_comment'></div>三坟五典。散为寒灰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366926_comment'></div>筑长城。起阿房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366926_comment'></div>并诸侯。杀豪俊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366926_comment'></div>自谓功高羲皇。国可万世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366926_comment'></div>思欲淩云气。求仙人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366926_comment'></div>登封泰山。风雨暴作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366926_comment'></div>虽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1366926", 1366926, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>五松</span>受职。草木有知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366926_comment'></div>而万象乖度。礼刑将弛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366926_comment'></div>则绮皓不得不遁于南山。鲁连不得不蹈于东海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366926_comment'></div>则桃源之避世者。可谓超升先觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366926_comment'></div>夫指鹿之俦。连颈而同死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366926_comment'></div>非吾党之谓乎。二翁耽老氏之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366926_comment'></div>继少卿之作。文以述大雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366926_comment'></div>道以通至精。卷舒天地之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366926_comment'></div>脱落神仙之境。武陵遗迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366926_comment'></div>可得而窥焉。问津利往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366926_comment'></div>水引渔者。花藏仙溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366926_comment'></div>春风不知从来。落英何许流出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366926_comment'></div>石洞来入。晨光尽开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366926_comment'></div>有良田名池。竹果森列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366926_comment'></div>三十六洞别为一天耶。今扁舟而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366926_comment'></div>笑谢人世。阡陌未改。<div class='inline' -----title
随州（隋县）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='b66c4b7da13844388be66afcfa46303d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b66c4b7da13844388be66afcfa46303d");'><span id='b66c4b7da13844388be66afcfa46303d_link' id='poem_title_1366922' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366922?labeling=true' target='_blank'>冬夜于随州紫阳先生餐霞楼送烟子元演隐仙城山序</a><span class='authorDate'>（732年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366922")'>李白</a></span><br /><div id='poem_sentence_0_1366922'>吾与霞子元丹烟子元演气激道合。结神仙交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366922_comment'></div>殊身同心。誓老云海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366922_comment'></div>不可夺也。历行天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366922_comment'></div>周求名山。入神农之故乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366922_comment'></div>得胡公之精术。胡公身揭日月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366922_comment'></div>心飞蓬莱。起餐霞之孤楼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366922_comment'></div>鍊吸景之精气。延我数子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366922_comment'></div>高谈混元。金书<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1366922", 1366922, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>玉诀</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366922_comment'></div>尽在此矣。白乃语及形胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366922_comment'></div>紫阳因大誇仙城。元侯闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366922_comment'></div>乘兴将往。别酒寒酌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366922_comment'></div>醉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1366922", 1366922, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>青田</span>而少留。魂梦晓飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366922_comment'></div>渡渌水以先去。吾不凝滞于物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366922_comment'></div>与时推移。出则以平交王侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366922_comment'></div>遁则以俯视巢许。朱绂狎我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366922_comment'></div>绿萝未归。恨不得同栖烟林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366922_comment'></div>对坐松月。有所款然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366922_comment'></div>铭契潭石。乘春当来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366922_comment'></div>且抱琴卧花。高枕相待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366922_comment'></div>诗以宠别。赋而赠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366922_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1366922_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span -----title
太原
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='d7d74daadfd649baac49004a677dd6c0_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("d7d74daadfd649baac49004a677dd6c0");'><span id='d7d74daadfd649baac49004a677dd6c0_link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=735&endYear=735')">735年</a>　秋，在太原送人赴京应举，有文。作品：《秋日于太原南栅饯阳曲王赞公贾少公石艾尹少公应举赴上都序》<div id='poem_1366917' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366917' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366917?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秋日于太原南栅饯阳曲王赞公贾少公石艾尹少公应举赴上都序</a><span class='authorDate'>（735年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366917'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366917'>天王<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1366917", 1366917, id='poem_sentence_7_1366917_comment'></div>则阳曲丞王公神仙之冑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366917_comment'></div>尔其学镜千古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366917_comment'></div>知周万殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366917_comment'></div>又若少府贾公以述作之雄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366917_comment'></div>鳌弄笔海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366917_comment'></div>虎攫辞场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366917_comment'></div>又若石艾尹少公廊庙之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366917_comment'></div>口折黄马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366917_comment'></div>手挥青萍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366917_comment'></div>咸道贯于人伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366917_comment'></div>名飞于日下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366917_comment'></div>实难沈屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366917_comment'></div>永怀青霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366917_comment'></div>剑有隐而气冲七星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366917_comment'></div>珠虽潜而光照万壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366917_comment'></div>今年春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1366917_comment'></div>皇帝有事千亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1366917_comment'></div>湛恩八埏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1366917_comment'></div>大搜群才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1366917_comment'></div>以缉邦政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1366917_comment'></div>而王公以令宰见举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1366917_comment'></div>贾公以王霸升闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1366917_comment'></div>海激伫乎三千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1366917_comment'></div>天飞期于六月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1366917_comment'></div>必有以也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1366917_comment'></div>岂徒然哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1366917_comment'></div>有从兄太原主簿舒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1366917_comment'></div>才华动时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1366917_comment'></div>规谋匠物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1366917_comment'></div>乃黕翠幕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1366917_comment'></div>凭轩高吟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1366917_comment'></div>汾河镜开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1366917_comment'></div>涨蓝都之气色。<div class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_26519", 26519, "Clauses/0/Comments/1")'>楚老</span>，歌咏徐安宜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_26519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_26519'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(10668, "poem_sentence_1_26519")'>制锦</span>不择地，操刀良在兹。<div id='poem_sentence_1_26519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_26519'>清风动百里，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_26519", 26519, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>惠化</span>闻京师。<div id='poem_sentence_2_26519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_26519'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_26519", 26519, id='poem_sentence_9_26519_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=739&endYear=739')">739年</a>　有诗寄淮南友人。作品：《寄淮南友人》<span class='poemContent' id='poem_content_25782'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_25782'>红颜悲旧国，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_25782", 25782, id='poem_content_26001'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_26001'>黄鹂啄紫椹，五月鸣桑枝。<div id='poem_sentence_0_26001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_26001'>我行不记日，误作阳春时。<div id='poem_sentence_1_26001_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_26001'>蚕老客未归，白田已缲丝。<div -----title
溧阳
-----detail

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=739&endYear=739')">739年</a>　游溧阳，有诗。作品：《游溧阳北湖亭望瓦屋山怀古赠同旅》<div id='poem_26386' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_26386' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/26386?labeling=true' target='_blank'>游溧阳北湖亭望瓦屋山怀古赠同旅<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作赠孟浩然）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（739年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_26386")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_26386_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_26386'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(764, "poem_allusion_26386")'>鞭尸</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1868, "poem_allusion_26386")'>子胥乞食</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_26386_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_26386'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_26386'>朝登北湖亭，遥望瓦屋山。<div id='poem_sentence_0_26386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_26386'>天清白露下，始觉秋风还。<div id='poem_sentence_1_26386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_26386'>游子托主人，仰观眉睫间。<div id='poem_sentence_2_26386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_26386'>目色送飞鸿，邈然不可攀。<div id='poem_sentence_3_26386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_26386'>长吁相劝勉，何事来吴关。<div id='poem_sentence_4_26386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_26386'>闻有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_26386", 26386, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>贞义女</span>，振穷溧水湾。<div id='poem_sentence_5_26386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_26386'>清光了在眼，白日如披颜。<div id='poem_sentence_6_26386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_26386'>高坟五六墩，崒兀栖猛虎。<div id='poem_sentence_7_26386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_26386'>遗迹翳九泉，芳名动千古。<div id='poem_sentence_8_26386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_26386'>子胥昔乞食，此女倾壶浆。<div id='poem_sentence_9_26386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_26386'>运开展宿愤，入楚鞭平王。<div id='poem_sentence_10_26386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_26386'>凛冽天地间，闻名若怀霜。<div id='poem_sentence_11_26386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_26386'>壮夫或未达，十步九太行。<div id='poem_sentence_12_26386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_26386'>与君拂衣去，万里同翱翔。<div id='poem_sentence_13_26386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_26386'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_26386_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='c4d77119e71145b4871644b7a34631d2_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c4d77119e71145b4871644b7a34631d2");'><span id='c4d77119e71145b4871644b7a34631d2_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=754&endYear=754')">754年</a>，54岁</div><div id='c4d77119e71145b4871644b7a34631d2' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在溧阳，有文。作品：《溧阳濑水贞义女碑铭（并序）》<span class='inlineComment2'>（郁贤皓主张此文作于天宝十五载避乱南奔溧阳时，见《李太白全集校注》第4045页。）</span><div id='poem_1366953' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366953' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366953?labeling=true' target='_blank'>溧阳濑水贞义女碑铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（754年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366953")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366953_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366953'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366953'>皇唐叶有六圣。再造八极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366953_comment'></div>镜照万方。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1366953", 1366953, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>幽明</span>咸熙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366953_comment'></div>天秩有礼。自太古及今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366953_comment'></div>君君臣臣。烈士贞女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366953_comment'></div>采其史传名节尤彰。可激清颓俗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366953_comment'></div>皆扫地而祠之。兰蒸椒浆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366953_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1366953", 1366953, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>岁祀</span>罔缺。而兹邑贞义女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366953_comment'></div>光灵翳然。埋冥古远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366953_comment'></div>琬玉不刻。岂前修博达者为邦之意乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366953_comment'></div>贞义女者。溧阳黄山里史氏之女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366953_comment'></div>以家溧阳。史阙书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366953_comment'></div>岁三十弗移其志。清英洁白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366953_comment'></div>事母纯孝。手柔荑而不龟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366953_comment'></div>身激漂以自业。当楚平王时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366953_comment'></div>王虐忠助谗。苛虐厥政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366953_comment'></div>芟于尚。斩于奢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366953_comment'></div>血流于朝。赤族伍氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366953_comment'></div>怨毒于人。何其深哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366953_comment'></div>子胥始东奔<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1366953", 1366953, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>勾吴</span>。月涉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1366953", 1366953, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>星遁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366953_comment'></div>或七日不火。伤弓于飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366953_comment'></div>逼迫于昭关。匍匐于濑渚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366953_comment'></div>舍车而徒。告穷此女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366953_comment'></div>目色以臆。授之壶浆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366953_comment'></div>全人自沈。形与口灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1366953_comment'></div>卓绝千古。声淩浮云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1366953_comment'></div>激节必报之雠。雪诚无疑之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1366953_comment'></div>难乎哉。借如曹娥潜波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1366953_comment'></div>理贯于孝道。聂姊殒肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1366953_comment'></div>槩动于天伦。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1366953", 1366953, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>鲁姑弃子</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1366953_comment'></div>以却三军之众。漂毋进饭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1366953_comment'></div>没受千金之恩。方之于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1366953_comment'></div>彼或易尔。卒使伍君开张阖闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1366953_comment'></div>倾荡鄢郢。吴师鞭尸于楚国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1366953_comment'></div>申胥泣血于秦庭。我亡尔存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1366953_comment'></div>亦各壮志。张英风于古今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1366953_comment'></div>雪大愤于天地。微此女之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1366953_comment'></div>虽员为忠孝之士。焉能咆哮烜赫施于后世耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1366953_comment'></div>望其溺所。怆然低佪而不能去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1366953_comment'></div>每风号吴天。月苦荆水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1366953_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_39_1366953", 1366953, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>响像</span>如在。精魂可悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1366953_comment'></div>惜其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1366953", 1366953, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>投金</span>有泉。而刻石无主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1366953_comment'></div>哀哉。邑宰荥阳郑公名晏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1366953_comment'></div>家康成之学。世子产之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1366953_comment'></div>琴清心閒。百里大化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1366953_comment'></div>有若主簿扶风窦嘉宾。县尉广平宋陟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1366953_comment'></div>丹阳李济。南郡陈然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1366953_comment'></div>清河张昭。皆有卿才霸略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1366953_comment'></div>同事相协。缅纪英淑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1366953_comment'></div>勒铭道周。虽陵颓海竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1366953_comment'></div>文或不死。其辞曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1366953_comment'></div>粲粲贞女。孤生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1366953", 1366953, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>寒门</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1366953_comment'></div>上无所天。下报母恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1366953_comment'></div>春风三十。花落无言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1366953_comment'></div>乃如之人。激漂清源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1366953_comment'></div>碧流素手。萦彼潺湲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1366953_comment'></div>求思不可。秉节而存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1366953_comment'></div>伍胥东奔。乞食于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1366953_comment'></div>女分壶浆。灭口而死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1366953_comment'></div>声动列国。义形壮士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1366953_comment'></div>入郢鞭尸。还吴雪耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1366953_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1366953", 1366953, "Clauses/120/Comments/0")'>投金</span>濑沚。报德称美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1366953_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1366953", 1366953, "Clauses/122/Comments/0")'>明明</span>千秋。如月在水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1366953_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_62_1366953_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在溧阳，有诗赠友人。作品：《戏赠郑溧阳》<div id='poem_26026' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_26026' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/26026?labeling=true' "poem_title_26026")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_26026_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_26026'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3624, "poem_allusion_26026")'>五柳</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(7000, id='poem_sentence_12_26103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_26103'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(26103)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=756&endYear=756')">756年</a>　在溧阳，有文。作品：《地藏菩萨赞》<div id='poem_26015' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_26015' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/26015?labeling=true' target='_blank'>地藏菩萨赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（756年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_26015")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_26015_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_26015'>大雄掩照。日月崩落。惟佛智慧大。而光生死雪。赖假普慈力。能救无边苦。独出旷劫。导开横流。则地藏菩萨为当仁矣。弟子扶风窦滔。少以英气爽迈。结交王侯。清风豪侠。极乐生疾。乃得惠剑于真宰。湛本心于虚空。愿图圣容。以祈景福。庶冥力凭助。而厥苦有瘳。爰命小才。式赞其事。赞曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_26015_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_26015'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_26015'>本心若虚空，清净无一物。<div id='poem_sentence_36_26426'>掺袂何所道，援毫投此辞。<div id='poem_sentence_36_26426_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_26426'></div><div id='poem_sentence_37_26426_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=756&endYear=756')">756年</a>　有词，或作于本年。作品：《菩萨蛮》（平林漠漠煙如織）<div id='poem_26559' gray;'>▪</span>有诗。作品：《拟古十二首》其十二（去去复去去）<div id='poem_26117' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_26117' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/26117?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟古十二首<span id='poem_content_26117'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_26117'>去去复去去，辞君还忆君。<div id='poem_sentence_0_26117_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_26117", 26117, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>岂得</span>长为群。<div id='poem_sentence_2_26117_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_26117", 26117, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>燕鸿</span>思朔云。<div id='poem_sentence_3_26117_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_26117'>别久容华晚，琅玕不能饭。<div id='poem_sentence_4_26117_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_26117'>日落知天昏，梦长觉道远。<div id='poem_sentence_5_26117_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_26117'>望夫登高山，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4138, "poem_sentence_6_26117")'>化石</span>竟不返。<div id='poem_sentence_6_26117_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_26117'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_26117_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

济宁（任城）

href='/Writing/1366931?labeling=true' target='_blank'>兖州任城县令厅壁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（750年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366931")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366931_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366931'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366931'>风姓之后。国为任城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366931_comment'></div>盖秦之古县也。在禹贡则南徐之分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366931_comment'></div>当周成乃东鲁之邦。自伯禽至于倾公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366931_comment'></div>三十四代。遭楚荡灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366931_comment'></div>因属楚焉。炎汉之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366931_comment'></div>更为郡县。隋开皇三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366931_comment'></div>废高平郡。移任城于旧居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366931_comment'></div>邑虽屡迁。井则不改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366931_comment'></div>鲁境七百里。郡有十一县<span class='inlineComment2'>（英华云十三县）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366931_comment'></div>任城当其要冲。东盘琅琊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366931_comment'></div>西控钜野。北走厥国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366931_comment'></div>南驰互乡。青帝太昊之遗墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366931_comment'></div>白衣尚书之旧里也。土俗古远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366931_comment'></div>风流清高。贤良閒生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366931_comment'></div>掩映天下。地博厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366931_comment'></div>川疏明。汉则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1366931", 1366931, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>名王</span>分茅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366931_comment'></div>魏则天人列土。所以代变豪侈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366931_comment'></div>家传文章。君子以才雄自高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366931_comment'></div>小人则鄙朴难治。况其城池爽垲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366931_comment'></div>邑屋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1366931", 1366931, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>丰润</span>。香阁倚日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366931_comment'></div>淩丹霄而欲飞。石桥横波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366931_comment'></div>惊彩虹而不去。其雄丽坱圠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366931_comment'></div>有如此焉。故万商往来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366931_comment'></div>四海绵历。实泉货之橐籥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1366931_comment'></div>为英髦之咽喉。故资大贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1366931_comment'></div>以主东道。制我美锦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1366931_comment'></div>不易其人。今乡二十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1366931_comment'></div>户一万三千三百七十一<span class='inlineComment2'>（英华云一十七）</span>。帝择明德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1366931_comment'></div>以贺季真宰之。公温恭克修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1366931_comment'></div>俨硕有立。季野备<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1366931", 1366931, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>四时之气</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1366931_comment'></div>士元非百里之才。拨烦弥閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1366931_comment'></div>剖剧无滞。镝百发克破于杨叶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1366931_comment'></div>刀一鼓必合于桑林。宽猛相济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1366931_comment'></div>韦弦适中。一之岁肃而教之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1366931_comment'></div>二之岁惠而安之。三之岁富而乐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1366931_comment'></div>然后青衿向训。黄发礼履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1366931_comment'></div>耒耜就役。农无游手之夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1366931_comment'></div>杼轴和鸣。机罕嚬蛾之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1366931_comment'></div>物不知化。陶然自春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1366931_comment'></div>权豪锄纵暴之心。黠吏返淳和之性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1366931_comment'></div>行者让于道路。任者并于轻重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1366931_comment'></div>扶老携幼。尊尊亲亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1366931_comment'></div>千载百年。再复鲁道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1366931_comment'></div>非神明博远。孰能契于此乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1366931_comment'></div>白探奇东蒙。窃听舆论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1366931_comment'></div>辄记于壁。垂之将来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1366931_comment'></div>俾后贤之操刀。知贺公之绝迹者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1366931_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1366931_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=750&endYear=750')">750年冬</a>　在任城，应鲁郡崇明寺僧人之请，作文。作品：《崇明寺陀罗尼幢颂并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（郁贤皓主张此文作于天宝八载，见《李太白全集校注》第3945页。）</span><div id='poem_1366900' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366900' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366900?labeling=true' target='_blank'>崇明寺佛顶尊胜陁罗尼幢颂</a><span class='authorDate'>（750年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366900")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366900_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1366900'>共工不触山。娲皇不补天。其鸿波汨汨流。伯禹不治水。万人其鱼乎。礼乐大坏。仲尼不作。王道其昏乎。而有功包阴阳。力掩造化。首出众圣。卓称大雄。彼三者之不足徵矣。粤有我西方金仙之垂范。觉旷劫之大梦。碎群愚之重昏。寂然不动。湛而常存。使苦海静滔天之波。疑山灭炎昆之火。囊括天地。置之清凉。日月或坠。神通自在。不其伟欤。鲁郡崇明寺南门佛顶尊胜陁罗尼石幢者。盖此都之壮观。昔善住天子及千大天游于园观。又与天女游戏。受诸快乐。即于夜分中闻有声曰。善住天子七日灭后。当生七反畜生之身。于是如来授之吉祥真经。遂脱诸苦。盖之天徵为大法印。不可得而闻也。我唐高宗时。有𦋺宾桑门持入中土。犹日藏大宝。清园虚空。檀金净彩。人皆悦见。所以山东开士。举国而崇之。时有万商投珍。士女云会众布。蓄沓如陵。琢文石于他山。耸高标于列肆。镵珉错䌽。为鲸为螭。天人海怪。若叱若语。贝叶金言刊其上。荷花水物形其隅。良工草莱。献技而去。圣君垂拱南面。穆清而居。大明广运。无幽不烛。以天下所立兹幢。多临诸旗亭。喧嚣湫隘。本非经行围绕之所。乃颁下明诏。令移于宝坊。吁。百尺中标。矗若云断。委翳苔藓。周流星霜。俾龙象兴嗟。仰瞻无地。良可叹也。我太官广武伯陇西李公。先名琬。奉诏书改为辅。其从政也。肃而宽。仁而惠。五镇方牧。声闻于天帝。乃加剖竹于鲁。鲁道粲然可观。方将和阴阳于太阶。致吾君于尧舜。岂徒闭阁坐啸。鸿盘二千哉。乃再崇厥功。发挥象教。于是与长史卢公司马李公等。咸明明在公。绰绰有裕。韬大国之宝。钟元精之和。荣兼半刺。道光列岳。才或大而用小。识无微而不通。政其有经。谈岂更仆。有律师道宗。心总群妙。量包大千。日何莹而常明。天不言而自运。识岸浪注。元机清发。每口演金偈。舌摇电光。开关延敌。罕有当者。由万窍同号于一风。众流俱纳于溟海。若乃严饬佛事。规矩梵天。法堂郁以雾开。香楼岌乎岛峙。皆我公之缔构也。以天宝八载五月一日。示灭大寺。百城号天。四众泣血。焚香散花。扶榇卧辙。仙鹤数十。飞鸣中绝。非至德动天。深仁感物者。其孰能与于此乎。三纲等皆论穷弥天。惠湛清月。传千灯于智种。了万法于真空。不谋同心。克树圣迹。太官李公乃命门于南垣庙通衢。曾盘旧规。累构馀石。壮士加勇。力侔拔山。才击鼓以雷作。拖鸿縻而电掣。千人壮。万夫势。转辘轳于横梁。泯环合而无际。常六合之振动。崛九霄之峥嵘。非鬼神功。曷以臻此。况其清景烛物。香风动尘。群形所沾。积苦都雪。粲星辰而增辉。挂文字而不灭。虽汉家金茎。伏波铜柱。拟兹陋矣。或日月圆满。方檀散华。清心讽持。诸佛称赞。夫如是。亦可以从一天至一天。开天宫之门。见群圣之颜。巍巍功德。不可量也。其录事参军。六曹英寮。及十一县官属。有宏才硕德。含香绣衣者。皆列名碑阴。此不具载。郡人都水使者宣道先生孙太冲。得真人紫蕊玉岌之书。能令太乙神自成还丹。以献于帝。帝服享万寿。与天同休。功成身退。谢病而去。不谓古之元通微妙之士欤。乃谓白曰。昔王文考观艺于鲁。骋雄辞于灵光。陆佐公知名在吴。铭双阙于盘石。吾子盍可美盛德。扬中和。恭承话言。敢不惟命。遂作颂曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1366900_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366900'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366900'>揭高幢兮表天宫。嶷独出兮淩星虹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366900_comment'></div>神摐摐兮来空。仡扶倾乎苍穹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366900_comment'></div>西方大圣称大雄。横绝苦海舟群蒙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366900_comment'></div>陁罗尼藏万法宗。善住天子获厥功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366900_comment'></div>明明李君牧东鲁。再新颓规扶众苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366900_comment'></div>如大云王注法雨。邦人清凉喜聚舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366900_comment'></div>扬鸿名兮振海浦。铭丰碑兮昭万古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366900_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1366900_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='d158bd20fdae4d1bbd8da9a9f2fc5d58_label'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=751&endYear=751')">751年春</a>　居任城，有诗。作品：《忆旧游寄谯郡元参军》<span class='inlineComment2'>（郁贤皓主张此诗作于天宝五载在鲁郡时，见《李太白全集校注》第1619页。）</span><div id='poem_25904' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_25904' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/25904?labeling=true' target='_blank'>忆旧游寄谯郡元参军</a><span class='authorDate'>（751年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_25904")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_25904_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_25904'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1225, "poem_allusion_25904")'>攀桂枝</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_25904_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_25904'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_25904'>忆昔洛阳董糟丘，为余天津桥南造酒楼。<div id='poem_sentence_0_25904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_25904'>黄金白璧买歌笑，一醉累月轻王侯。<div id='poem_sentence_1_25904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_25904'>海内贤豪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_25904", 25904, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>青云客</span>，就中与君心莫逆。<div id='poem_sentence_2_25904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_25904'>迥山转海不作难，倾情倒意无所惜。<div id='poem_sentence_3_25904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_25904'>我向淮南<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1225, id='poem_sentence_5_25904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_25904'>三十六曲水<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_25904", 25904, id='poem_sentence_7_25904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_25904'>紫阳之真人，邀我吹玉笙。<div id='poem_sentence_8_25904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_25904'>餐霞楼上动仙乐，嘈然宛似鸾凤鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_9_25904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_25904'>袖长管催欲轻举，汉中太守醉起舞。<div id='poem_sentence_10_25904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_25904'>手持锦袍覆我身，我醉横眠枕其股。<div id='poem_sentence_11_25904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_25904'>当筵意气凌九霄，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_25904", 25904, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>星离雨散</span>不终朝，分飞楚关山水遥。<div id='poem_sentence_16_25904'>行来北凉岁月深，感君贵<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作重）</span>义轻黄金。<div id='poem_sentence_16_25904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_25904'>兴来携妓恣经过，其若杨花似雪何。<div id='poem_sentence_20_25904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_25904'>红妆欲醉宜斜日，百尺清潭写<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_25904", 25904, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>翠娥</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_21_25904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_25904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_25904'>清风吹歌人空去，歌曲自绕行云飞。<div id='poem_sentence_23_25904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 金乡

id='poem_sentence_5_25936_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_25936'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_25936_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_25936_comment'></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
单县（单父）

"Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>烟涛</span>微茫信难求。<div id='poem_sentence_0_26361_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_26361'>越人语<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_26361", 26361, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>天姥</span>，云霓<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作霞）</span>明灭或<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作安）</span>可睹。<div id='poem_sentence_1_26361_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_26361'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_26361", 26361, id='poem_sentence_9_26361_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_26361'>熊咆龙吟殷岩泉，慄深林兮惊层巅。<div id='poem_sentence_10_26361_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_26361_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_26361'>使我不得开<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_26361", 26361, -----title
叶县

id='poem_content_1366896'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366896'>东风归来。见碧草而知春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366896_comment'></div>荡漾恍惚。何垂杨旖旎之愁人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366896_comment'></div>天光清而妍和。海气绿而芳新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366896_comment'></div>䌽翠兮芊眠。云飘飖而相鲜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366896_comment'></div>演漾兮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1366896", 1366896, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>夤缘</span>。窥青苔之生泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366896_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1366896", 1366896, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>缥缈</span>兮<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1366896", 1366896, "Clauses/10/Comments/1")'>翩绵</span>。见游丝之萦烟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366896_comment'></div>魂与此兮俱断。对风光兮悽然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366896_comment'></div>若乃陇水秦声。江猿巴吟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366896_comment'></div>明妃玉塞。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1366896", 1366896, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>楚客</span>枫林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366896_comment'></div>试登高而望远。痛切骨而伤心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366896_comment'></div>春心荡兮如波。春愁乱兮如雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366896_comment'></div>兼万情之悲欢。兹一感于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1366896", 1366896, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>芳节</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366896_comment'></div>若有一人兮湘水滨。隔云霓而见无因。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366896_comment'></div>洒别泪于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1366896", 1366896, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>尺波</span>。寄东流于情亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366896_comment'></div>若使春光可揽而不灭兮。吾欲赠天涯之佳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366896_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1366896_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1366895' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366895' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366895?labeling=true' target='_blank'>惜馀春赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（741年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366895")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366895_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366895'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366895'>天之何为令北斗而知春兮。回指于东方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366895_comment'></div>水荡漾兮碧色。兰葳蕤兮红芳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366895_comment'></div>试登高兮望远。极云海之微茫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366895_comment'></div>魂一去兮欲断。泪流颊兮成行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366895_comment'></div>吟清风而咏沧浪。怀洞庭兮悲潇湘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366895_comment'></div>何予心之缥缈兮。与春风而飘扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366895_comment'></div>飘扬兮思无限。念佳期兮莫展。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366895_comment'></div>平原萋兮绮色。爱芳草兮如剪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366895_comment'></div>惜馀春之将阑。每为恨兮不浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366895_comment'></div>汉之曲兮江之潭。把瑶草兮思何堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366895_comment'></div>想<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1366895", 1366895, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>游女</span>于岘北。愁帝子于湘南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366895_comment'></div>恨无极兮心氲氲。目眇眇兮忧纷纷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366895_comment'></div>披卫情于淇水。结<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1366895", 1366895, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>楚梦</span>于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1366895", 1366895, "Clauses/25/Comments/1")'>阳云</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366895_comment'></div>春每归兮花开。花已阑兮春改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366895_comment'></div>叹长河之流速。送驰波于东海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366895_comment'></div>春不留兮时已失。老衰飒兮情逾疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366895_comment'></div>恨不得挂长绳于青天。系此西飞之白日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366895_comment'></div>若有人兮情相亲。去南越兮往西秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366895_comment'></div>见游丝之横路。网春晖以留人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366895_comment'></div>沈吟兮哀歌。踯躅兮伤别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366895_comment'></div>送行子之将远。看征鸿之稍灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366895_comment'></div>望夫君兮兴咨嗟。横涕泪兮怨<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1366895", 1366895, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>春华</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366895_comment'></div>遥寄影于明月。送夫君于天涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1366895_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1366895_comment'></div></div></div><br ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=751&endYear=751')">751年</a>　得元丹丘新营幽居消息，欲往从游。作品：《闻丹丘子于城北山营石门幽居中有高凤遗迹仆离群远怀亦有栖遁之志因叙旧以赠之》<span class='inlineComment2'>（郁贤皓主张此诗作于天宝九载，见《李太白全集校注》第1601页。）</span><div id='poem_allusion_26307_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_26307'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_26307'>春华沧江月，秋色碧海云。<div id='poem_sentence_0_26307_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_26307'>离居盈寒暑，对此长思君。<div id='poem_sentence_1_26307_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 开封

杞县（雍丘）

id='poem_sentence_2_26007_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_26007'>古人不可攀，去若浮云没。<div id='poem_sentence_3_26007_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_26007'>愿言弄倒景，从此鍊真骨。<div id='poem_sentence_4_26007_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_26007'>华顶窥绝溟，蓬壶望超忽。<div id='poem_sentence_5_26007_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_26007'>不知青春度，但怪绿芳歇。<div id='poem_sentence_6_26007_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_26007'>空持钓鳌心，从此谢<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(5612, "poem_sentence_7_26007")'>魏阙</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_26007_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_26007'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_26007_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_26409' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_26409' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/26409?labeling=true' target='_blank'>越中秋怀</a><span class='authorDate'>（747年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_26409")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_26409_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_26409'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_26409'>越水绕碧山，周回数千里。<div id='poem_sentence_0_26409_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_26409'>乃是天镜中，分明画相似<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_26409_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_26409'>爱此从冥搜，永怀临湍游<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作幽）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_26409_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_26409'>一为沧波客，十见<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_26409", 26409, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>红蕖</span>秋。<div id='poem_sentence_3_26409_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_26409'>观涛壮天险，望海令人愁。<div id='poem_sentence_4_26409_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_26409'>路遐迫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_26409", 26409, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>西照</span>，岁晚悲东流。<div id='poem_sentence_5_26409_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_26409'>何必探<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_26409", 26409, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>禹穴</span>，逝将归蓬丘。<div id='poem_sentence_6_26409_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_26409'>不然五湖上，亦可乘扁舟。<div id='poem_sentence_7_26409_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_26409'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_26409_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_26409'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_26409_0'>⑴ 一本首四句作“蹈海思仲连，游山慕康乐。攀云穷千峰，弄水涉万壑。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_26409_comment'></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
天台
-----detail

class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=750&endYear=750')">750年</a>，50岁</div><div id='998e751634474b889954cc0a30329aef' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=750&endYear=750')">750年</a>　在虞城，有文。作品：《虞城县令李公去思颂碑（并序）》<span class='inlineComment2'>（郁贤皓主张此诗作于天宝八载李锡离任时，见《李太白全集校注》第4081页。）</span><div id='poem_1366951' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366951' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366951?labeling=true' target='_blank'>虞城县令李公去思颂碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（750年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366951")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366951_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1366951'>王者立国君人。聚散六合。咸土以百里。雷其威声。革其俗而风之。渔其人而𣹢之。其犹众鲜洋洋。乐化在水。波而动之则忧。赪尾之刺作焉。徐而清之则安。颁首之颂兴焉。苟非大贤。孰可育物。而能光昭弦歌。卓立振古。则有虞城宰李公焉。公名锡。字元勋。陇西成纪人也。高祖楷。隋上大将军绵益原三州刺史。封汝阳公。曾祖腾云。皇朝广茂二州都督广武伯。祖立节。起家韩王府记室参军。袭广武伯。父浦。郢海淄唐陈五州刺史鲁郡都督广平太守。袭广武伯。皆纳忠王庭。名镂钟鼎。侯伯继迹。故可略而言焉。公即广武伯之元子也。年十九。拜北海寿光尉。心不挂细务。口不言人非。群吏罕测。望风敬惮。秩满。转右武卫仓曹参军。次任赵郡昭庆县令。奉诏修建初启运二陵。总徒五郡。支用三万贯。举筑雷野。不鞭一人。功成。馀八千贯。其干能之声。大振乎齐赵矣。时名卿巡按。陵有黄赤气上冲太微。散为庆云数十处。盖精诚动天地也如此。因粉图奏名。编入国史。天宝四载拜虞城令。而天章宠荣。俾金玉王度。炯若七耀。昭回堂隅。于戏。敬之哉。宸威临顾。作训以理。其俗鲁而木。舒而徐。急则狼戾。缓则鸟散。公酌以钧道。和之琴心。于是安四人。敷五教。处必砺食。行惟单车。观其约而吏俭。仰其敬而俗让。激直士之素节。扬廉夫之清波。三月政成。邻境取则。因行春。见枯骸于路隅。恻然疚怀。出俸而葬。由是百里掩骼。四封归仁。有居丧行号城市者。习以成俗。公勖之亲邻。厄以凶事。而鳏寡茕独。众所赖焉。可谓变其颓风。永锡尔类。先时邑中有聚党横猾者。实惟二耿之族。几百家焉。公训为纯人。易其里曰大忠正之里。北境黎邱之古鬼焉。或醉父以刃其子。自公到职。蔑闻为灾。官宅旧井。水清而味苦。公下车尝之。莞尔而笑曰。既苦且清。足以符吾志也。遂汲用不改。变为甘泉。蠡邱馆东有三柳焉。公往来憩之。饮水则去。行路勿剪。比于甘棠。乡人因树而书颂四十有六篇。惟公志气塞乎天地。德音发乎声容。缟乎若寒崖之霜。湛乎若清川之月。弹恶雪善。速若箭飞。尤能笔工新文。口吐雅论。天下美士。多从之游。非汝阳三公二伯之积德。则何以生此。邑之贤老刘楚瑰等乃相谓曰。我李公以神明之化。大赖于虞人。虞人陶然咏歌其德。官则敬。去则思。山川鬼神犹怀之。况于人乎。乃咨群寮。兴去思之颂。县丞王彦暹员外丞魏陟主簿李诜县尉李向赵济卢荣等。同德比义。好谋而成。相与采其瑰踪茂行。俾刻石篆美。庶清风令名。奋乎百世之上。其词曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1366951_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366951'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366951'>激扬之水兮白石有凿。李公之来兮雪虞人之恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366951_comment'></div>厥德<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1366951", 1366951, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>孔昭</span>。折狱既清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366951_comment'></div>五教大行。殷云雷之声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366951_comment'></div>既父其父。又子其子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366951_comment'></div>春之以风。化成草靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366951_comment'></div>乃影我冈。乃雨我田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366951_comment'></div>阳无骄愆。四载有年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366951_comment'></div>人戴公之贤。犹百里之天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366951_comment'></div>弃余往矣。茫如坠川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366951_comment'></div>哀丧惠博。掩骼仁深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366951_comment'></div>苦井变甘。凶人易心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366951_comment'></div>三柳勿剪。永思清音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366951_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1366951_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

-----title
广平（清漳）

id='poem_sentence_8_26525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_26525'>河堤绕绿水，桑柘连青云。<div id='poem_sentence_9_26525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_26525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_26525'>缲丝鸣机杼，百里声相闻。<div id='poem_sentence_11_26525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_26525'>讼息鸟下阶，高卧披<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_26525", 26525, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>道帙</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_26525_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_26525'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(762, "poem_sentence_13_26525")'><span class='link' 邯郸

大兴（范阳）

id='poem_26086' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_26086' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/26086?labeling=true' target='_blank'>行行游且猎篇</a><span class='authorDate'>（752年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_26086")'>李白</a></span><br /><div id='poem_sentence_7_26306'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_26306_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=752&endYear=752')">752年</a>　在幽州，目击安禄山跋扈之状，心甚忧之，但无能为力，登燕昭王黄金台遗址，一酒忧国忧民之泪。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=752&endYear=752')">752年</a>　离开幽州。<br /></div>
-----end

id='poem_sentence_2_1366919_comment'></div>酒隐安陆。蹉●8BCA十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366919_comment'></div>初嘉兴季父谪长沙西还。时予拜见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366919_comment'></div>预饮林下。耑乃稚子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366919_comment'></div>嬉游在傍。今来有成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366919_comment'></div>郁负秀气。吾衰久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366919_comment'></div>见尔慰心。申悲道旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366919_comment'></div>破涕为笑。方告我远涉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366919_comment'></div>西登香炉。长山横蹙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366919_comment'></div>九江却转。瀑布天落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366919_comment'></div>半与银河争流。腾虹奔电。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366919_comment'></div>潨射万壑。此宇宙之奇诡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366919_comment'></div>其上有方湖石井。不可得而窥焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366919_comment'></div>羡君此行。抚鹤长啸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366919_comment'></div>恨丹液未就。白龙来迟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366919_comment'></div>使秦人著鞭先往。桃花之水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366919_comment'></div>孤负夙愿。惭未归于名山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366919_comment'></div>终期后来。携手五岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366919_comment'></div>情以送远。诗宁阙乎。<div class='inline' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_25859' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/25859?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠黄山胡公求白鹇</a><span class='authorDate'>（754年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_25859")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_25859_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_25859'>闻黄山胡公有双白鹇，盖是家鸡所伏，自小驯狎，了无惊猜，以其名呼之，皆就掌取食。然此鸟耿介，尤难畜之，余平生酷好，竟莫能致。而胡公辍赠于我，唯求一诗。闻之欣然，适会宿意，因援笔三叫，文不加点以赠之。</div><div id='poem_preface_25859_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_25859'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_25859'>请以双白璧，买君双白鹇。<div id='poem_sentence_0_25859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_25859'>白鹇白如锦，白雪耻容颜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_25859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_25859'>照影玉潭里，<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_3_25859'>夜栖寒月静，朝步落花闲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_25859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_25859'>我愿得此鸟，玩之坐碧山。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=755&endYear=755')">755年</a>　在宣城，有诗赠友人。作品：《寄当涂赵少府炎》<div id='poem_25780' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_25780' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/25780?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄当涂赵少府炎</a><span class='authorDate'>（755年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_25780")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_25780_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_25780'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_25780'>晚登高楼望，木落双江清。<div id='poem_sentence_0_25780_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_25780'>寒山饶积翠，秀色连州城。<div id='poem_sentence_1_25780_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_25780'>目送楚云尽，心悲胡雁声。<div id='poem_sentence_2_25780_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_25780'>相思不可见，回首故人情。<div id='poem_sentence_3_25780_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_25780'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_25780_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=755&endYear=755')">755年冬</a>　返宣城，有文。作品：《赵公西候新亭颂》<div id='poem_1366899' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366899' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366899?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赵公西候新亭颂</a><span class='authorDate'>（755年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366899")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1366899_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1366899'>惟十有四载。皇帝以岁之骄阳。秋五不稔。乃慎择明牧。恤南方凋枯。伊四月孟夏。自淮阴迁我天水赵公作藩于宛陵。祗明命也。惟公代秉天宪。作程南台。洪柯大本。聿生懿德。宜乎哉。横风霜之秀气。郁王霸之奇略。初以铁冠白笔。佐我燕京。威雄振肃。虏不敢视。而后鸣琴二邦。天下取则。起草三省。朝端有声。天子识面。宰衡动听。殷南山之雷。剖赤县之剧。强项不屈。三州所居大化。咸列碑颂。至于是邦也。酌古以训俗。宣风以布和。平心理人。兵镇唯静。画一千里。时无莠言。公退之暇。清眺原隰。以此郡东堑巨海。西襟长江。咽三吴。扼五岭。輶轩错出。无旬时而息焉。出自西郭。苍然古道。道寡列树。行无清阴。至有疾雷破山。狂飙震壑。炎景烁野。秋霖灌途。马逼侧于谷口。人周章于山顶。亭候靡设。逢迎阙如。自唐有天下。作牧百数。因循龌龊。罔恢永图。及公来思。大革前弊。实相此土。陟降观之。壮其回冈龙盘。沓岭波起。胜势交至。可以有作。方农之隙。廓如是营。遂铲崖堙卑。驱石剪棘。削污壤。阶高隅。以门以墉。乃栋乃宇。俭则不陋。丽而不奢。森沈闬闳。燥湿有庇。若鳌之涌。如鹏斯骞。萦流镜转。涵映池底。纳远海之馀清。泻莲峰之积翠。信一方雄胜之郊。五马踟蹰之地也。长史齐公光乂。人伦之师表。司马武公幼成。衣冠之髦彦。录事参军吴镇。宣城令崔钦。令德之后。良材间生。纵风教之乐地。出人伦之高格。卓绝映古。清明在躬。佥谋僝功。不日而就。总是役也。伊二公之力欤。过客沈吟以称叹。邦人聚舞以相贺。佥曰我赵公之亭也。群寮献议。请因谣颂以名之。则必与谢公北亭同不朽矣。白以为谢公德不及后世。亭不留要冲。无勿拜之言。鲜登高之赋。方之今日。我则过矣。敢询耆老。而作颂曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1366899_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366899'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366899'>耽耽高亭，赵公所营。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1366899_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1366899'>如鳌背突兀于太清，如鹏翼开张而欲行。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1366899_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1366899'>赵公之宇，千载有睹。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1366899_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1366899'>必恭必敬，爰游爰处。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1366899_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1366899'>瞻而思之，罔敢大语。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1366899_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1366899'>赵公来翔，有礼有章。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1366899_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1366899'>煌煌锵锵，如文翁之堂。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1366899_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1366899'>清风洋洋，永世不忘。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1366899_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1366899'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1366899_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_41_1366908_comment'></div>既齐飞于鹓鹭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1366908_comment'></div>复寄迹于门馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1366908_comment'></div>皆相公大造之力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1366908_comment'></div>而钟鸣漏尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1366908_comment'></div>夜行不息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1366908_comment'></div>止足之分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1366908_comment'></div>实愧古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1366908_comment'></div>犬马恋主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1366908_comment'></div>迫于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1366908", 1366908, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>西汜</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1366908_comment'></div>所冀枯松晚岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1366908_comment'></div>无改节于风霜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1366908_comment'></div>老骥馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1366908_comment'></div>期尽力于蹄足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1366908_comment'></div>以答明主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1366908_comment'></div>下报相公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1366908_comment'></div>慺慺之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1366908_comment'></div>屏息于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1366908_comment'></div>伏惟相公收遗簪于少昊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1366908_comment'></div>念亡弓于楚泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1366908_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1366908", 1366908, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>衰当益壮</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1366908_comment'></div>结草知归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1366908_comment'></div>瞻望恩光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1366908_comment'></div>无忘景刻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1366937'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1366937_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=755&endYear=755')">755年12月</a>　闻安史之乱作，门人武谔来访，许北去鲁中，接子女南来，白赋诗以赠。作品：《赠武十七谔（并序）》<span class='inlineComment2'>（郁贤皓主张此诗作于至德元年，见《李太白全集校注》第1319页。）</span><div id='poem_26512' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_26512' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/26512?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠武十七谔并序</a><span class='authorDate'>（755年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_26512")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_26512_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_26512'>门人武谔，深于义者也。质本沈悍，慕要离之风，潜钓川海（潜钓江海），不数数于世间事。闻中原作难，西来访余（西来谒余）。余爱子伯禽在鲁，许将冒胡兵以致之。酒酣感激，援笔而赠。</div><div id='poem_preface_26512_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' -----title
青阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='ca2161308b414cc09d5ba16af5130fec_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ca2161308b414cc09d5ba16af5130fec");'><span id='ca2161308b414cc09d5ba16af5130fec_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=755&endYear=755')">755年</a>，55岁</div><div id='ca2161308b414cc09d5ba16af5130fec' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=755&endYear=755')">755年春</a>　春游青阳，改九子山为九华山，有诗。作品：《改九子山为九华山联句（并序）》<div id='poem_26118' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_26118' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/26118?labeling=true' target='_blank'>改九子山为九华山联句</a><span class='authorDate'>（755年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_26118")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_26118_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_26118'>青阳县南有九子山，山高数十丈，上有九峰如莲花，按图徵名，无所依据。太史公南游，略而不书。事绝古老之口，复阙名贤之纪，虽灵仙往复，而赋咏罕闻。予乃削其旧号，加以九华之目。时访道江汉，憩于夏侯迥之堂，开檐暗帻，坐眺松雪，因与二三子联句，传之将来。</div><div id='poem_preface_26118_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_26118'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_26118'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_26118", 26118, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>妙有</span>分二气，灵山开九华<span class='inlineComment2'>（白）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_26118_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_26118'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_26118", 26118, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>层标</span>遏迟日，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_26118", 26118, "Clauses/3/Comments/1")'>半壁</span>明朝霞<span class='inlineComment2'>（霁）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_26118_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_26118'>积雪曜阴壑，飞流喷阳崖<span id='poem_sentence_3_26118_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_26118'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_26118_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: -----title
南陵
-----detail

丹阳

-----title
湘阴
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='e92fb7d5fbe44e88882f26c21e6884ef_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e92fb7d5fbe44e88882f26c21e6884ef");'><span id='e92fb7d5fbe44e88882f26c21e6884ef_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=759&endYear=759')">759年</a>，59岁</div><div id='e92fb7d5fbe44e88882f26c21e6884ef' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=759&endYear=759')">759年</a>　经湘阴，悼崔成甫，有文。作品：《泽畔吟序》<div id='poem_1366924' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1366924' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1366924?labeling=true' target='_blank'>泽畔吟序</a><span class='authorDate'>（759年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_1366924")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1366924_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1366924'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1366924'>泽畔吟者。逐臣崔公之所作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1366924_comment'></div>公代业文宗。早茂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1366924", 1366924, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>才秀</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1366924_comment'></div>起家校书蓬山。再尉关辅中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1366924_comment'></div>佐于宪车。因贬湘阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1366924_comment'></div>从宦二十有八载。而官未登于郎署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1366924_comment'></div>何遇时而不偶耶。所谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1366924", 1366924, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>大名难居</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1366924_comment'></div>硕果不食。流离乎沅湘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1366924_comment'></div>摧悴于草莽。同时得罪者数十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1366924_comment'></div>或才长命夭。覆巢荡室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1366924_comment'></div>崔公忠愤义烈。形于清辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1366924_comment'></div>恸哭泽畔。哀形于翰墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1366924_comment'></div>犹风雅之什。闻之无罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1366924_comment'></div>睹之者作镜。书所感遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1366924_comment'></div>总二十章。名之曰泽畔吟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1366924_comment'></div>惧奸臣之猜。常韬之于竹简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1366924_comment'></div>酷吏将至。则藏之于名山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1366924_comment'></div>前后数四。蠹伤卷轴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1366924_comment'></div>观其逸气顿挫。英风激扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1366924_comment'></div>横波遗流。腾薄万古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1366924_comment'></div>至于微而彰。婉而丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1366924_comment'></div>悲不自我。兴成他人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1366924_comment'></div>岂不云怨者之流乎。余览之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1366924_comment'></div>怆然掩卷。挥涕为之序云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1366924_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1366924_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

南昌（豫章）

class='poemContent' id='poem_content_26070'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_26070'>桂水分五岭，衡山朝九疑。<div id='poem_sentence_0_26070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_26070'>乡关渺安西，流浪将何之。<div id='poem_sentence_1_26070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_26070'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_26070", 26070, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>素色</span>愁明湖，秋渚晦寒姿。<div id='poem_sentence_2_26070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_26070'>畴昔紫芳意，已过<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_26070", 26070, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>黄发期</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_26070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_26070'>君王纵疏散，云壑借<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_26070", 26070, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>巢夷</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_26070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_26070'>尔去之罗浮，我还憩峨眉。<div id='poem_sentence_5_26070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_26070'>中阔道万里，霞月遥相思。<div id='poem_sentence_6_26070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_26070'>如寻楚狂子，琼树有芳枝。<div id='poem_sentence_7_26070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_26070'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_26070_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在建昌，有诗。作品：《对酒醉题屈突明府厅》<div id='poem_25698' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_25698' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/25698?labeling=true' target='_blank'>对酒醉题屈突明府厅</a><span class='authorDate'>（760年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_25698")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_25698_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_25698'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_25698'>陶令八十日，长歌归去来。<div id='poem_sentence_0_25698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_25698'>故人建昌宰，借问几时回。<div id='poem_sentence_1_25698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_25698'>风落吴江雪，纷纷入酒杯。<div id='poem_sentence_2_25698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_25698'>山翁今已醉，舞袖为君开。<div id='poem_sentence_3_25698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_25698'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_25698_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
怀远（钟离）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='c3a8dec867aa4b32a05234cee9541ec5_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c3a8dec867aa4b32a05234cee9541ec5");'><span id='c3a8dec867aa4b32a05234cee9541ec5_link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=761&endYear=761')">761年</a>　由浔阳沿江东下，途经长风沙，有诗赠友人。作品：《江上赠窦长史》<span class='inlineComment2'>（郁贤皓疑此诗为至德二载冬末从长风沙启程流放赠别舒州窦长史之作，见《李太白全集校注》第1416页。）</span><div id='poem_26068' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_26068' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/26068?labeling=true' target='_blank'>江上赠窦长史</a><span class='authorDate'>（761年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_26068")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_26068_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_26068'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' id='poem_allusion_26068_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_26068'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_26068'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3777, "poem_sentence_0_26068")'>汉求季布</span>鲁朱家，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1807, "poem_sentence_0_26068")'>楚逐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_26068", 26068, "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>伍胥</span></span>去章华。<div id='poem_sentence_0_26068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_26068'>万里<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_26068", 26068, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>南迁</span>夜郎国，三年归及长风沙。<div id='poem_sentence_1_26068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_26068'>闻道青云贵公子，锦帆游戏西江水。<div id='poem_sentence_2_26068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_26068'>人疑天上坐楼船，水净霞明两重绮。<div id='poem_sentence_3_26068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_26068'>相约相期何太深，棹歌摇艇月中寻。<div id='poem_sentence_4_26068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_26068'>不同珠履三千客，别欲论交一片心。<div id='poem_sentence_5_26068_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_26068'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_26068_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
宜兴（义兴）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='8bedf600623d415ea157222db0377ae1_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8bedf600623d415ea157222db0377ae1");'><span id='8bedf600623d415ea157222db0377ae1_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=761&endYear=761')">761年</a>，61岁</div><div id='8bedf600623d415ea157222db0377ae1' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=761&endYear=761')">761年</a>　在义兴，有诗赠友人。作品：《赠从孙义兴宰铭》<div id='poem_26483' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_26483' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/26483?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠从孙义兴宰铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（761年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 盛唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(15188, "盛唐", "李白", "poem_title_26483")'>李白</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_26483_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_26483'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1023, "poem_allusion_26483")'>琴堂</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3312, "poem_allusion_26483")'>弦歌</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4085, "poem_allusion_26483")'>河阳</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(526, "poem_allusion_26483")'>雪会稽</span>　<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(10002, "poem_allusion_26483")'>应桑林</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_26483_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_26483'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_26483'>天子思茂宰，天枝得英才。<div id='poem_sentence_0_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_26483'>朗然清秋月，独出映吴台。<div id='poem_sentence_1_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_26483'>落笔生绮绣，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_26483", 26483, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>操刀</span>振风雷。<div id='poem_sentence_2_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_26483'>蠖屈虽百里，鹏骞望三台。<div id='poem_sentence_3_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_26483'>退食无外事，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1023, "poem_sentence_4_26483")'>琴堂</span>向山开。<div id='poem_sentence_4_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_26483'>绿水寂以闲，白云有时来。<div id='poem_sentence_5_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_26483'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(4085, "poem_sentence_6_26483")'>河阳</span>富奇藻，彭泽纵名杯。<div id='poem_sentence_6_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_26483'>所恨不见之，犹如仰昭回。<div id='poem_sentence_7_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_26483'>元恶昔滔天，疲人散幽草。<div id='poem_sentence_8_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_26483'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_26483", 26483, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>惊川</span>无活鳞，举邑罕遗老。<div id='poem_sentence_9_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_26483'>誓<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(526, "poem_sentence_10_26483")'>雪会稽</span>耻，将奔宛陵道。<div id='poem_sentence_10_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_26483'>亚相素所重，投刃<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(10002, "poem_sentence_11_26483")'>应桑林</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_26483'>独坐伤激扬，神融一开襟。<div id='poem_sentence_12_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_26483'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3312, "poem_sentence_13_26483")'>弦歌</span>欣再理，和乐醉人心。<div id='poem_sentence_13_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_26483'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_26483", 26483, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>蠹政</span>除害马，倾巢有归禽。<div id='poem_sentence_14_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_26483'>壶浆候君来，聚舞共讴吟。<div id='poem_sentence_15_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_26483'>农人弃蓑笠，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_26483", 26483, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>蚕女</span>堕缨簪。<div id='poem_sentence_16_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_26483'>欢笑相拜贺，则知惠爱深<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_17_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_26483'>历职吾所闻，称贤尔为最。<div id='poem_sentence_18_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_26483'>化洽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_26483", 26483, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>一邦</span>上，名驰三江外。<div id='poem_sentence_19_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_26483'>峻节贯云霄，通方堪远大。<div id='poem_sentence_20_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_26483'>能文变风俗，好客留轩盖。<div id='poem_sentence_21_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_26483'>他日一来游，因之严光濑。<div id='poem_sentence_22_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_26483'></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_26483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_26483'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_17_26483_0'>⑴ 亚相李公重之以能政，中丞李公免罢以移官</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_26483_comment'></div></div><br /></div>
-----end
